Specifically Gohar provides printing, scanning, cartridge refilling and lamination of documents. Her husband helps her with the work and they try hard to earn income for their family living.
 
The requested loan of USD 2,000 is very important for Gohar to be able to purchase a copying machine, a PC and a printer needed for her work. She hopes for lenders' support in funding her loan and supporting her business.

loans.use: to pay for a copying machine, a PC and a printer

loans.name: David

texts.en: Dairy farming is a very profitable business venture and David, a father of 5, has been involved in this for the past 9 years. He is based in Kabiyet village, a remote village in Eldoret town. This town is known for producing elite runners in the long distances who have won major events. His primary income source is eggs, milk and a variety of crops he sells to make ends meet. Of all the activities he is involved in, he finds dairy farming very fulfilling and has nicknamed one of his cow “Boyomet”. Waking up every morning to go milk his cows makes him a proud farmer. He sells milk to his neighbors, to the local market and to primary schools around his area. His biggest challenge is meeting the demand that is so high and he is seeking a loan to buy a quality dairy cow. David is a member of Siryat wema group and through Juhudi Kilimo he received training on financial management. Through the loan he will satisfy the demand for milk in his area and this will translate to improved income levels and profit margins. Juhudi Kilimo is an organization that helps small scale farmers achieve their dreams through financial solutions and through this loan David’s life is going to completely change. The loan will help David buy a quality cow that will be producing between 10-15 liters of milk and this will improve his income greatly. Profits from selling milk will be used in improving his living conditions and repaying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a quality breed of dairy cow.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en: Edwin, 32, is a hardworking, self-driven and dedicated farmer who is based in Kapsowar, a remote rural town in Kenya. This area has harsh weather conditions and poultry farming is a profitable business venture. For the past 2 years he has been involved in mixed farming and through milk and egg selling he has been able to earn a decent income. Although he makes profits, of all the activities he is involved in, poultry farming is closest to his heart. Waking up every morning to feed and collect eggs from his poultry makes him very proud. Feeding his poultry is his hobby. Demand for poultry is high in Kapsowar and the supply is low. Edwin being an enterprising farmer will want to take advantage. He is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. Because of the harsh weather conditions and rough terrain, poultry farming is the only profitable business venture in Kapsowar. He plans to buy exotic breeds of poultry that have high productivity and high resistance to diseases. Through your loan Edwin is going to meet the demand in his area and local market and this will translate to increased income levels and increased profit margins. With your loan, Edwin is going to transform and completely improve his living conditions. Increased profits will be used to repay back the loan and secure the future of his children through education since education is the key to success.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry.

loans.name: Muhammad Azhar

texts.en:
Muhammad Azhar lives in Karachi. He is 26 years old and recently got married. He owns a dairy farm where he produces dairy products which are then sold to different households in Karachi. He mainly sells milk. He is young, hardworking and honest. The number of households he supplies milk to is increasing everyday. He wants to grab this opportunity and increase sales. But for this, he needs additional cows to produce more milk. In order to become stable and self-sufficient, he wants to buy more cows to increase milk production for selling purposes. Therefore, he has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan as his current income is not sufficient to help him buy cows for his farm. 

He is hopeful that this loan will help him in increasing his income. He plans to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy cows for his dairy farm.

loans.name: Saefudin

texts.en:
Saefudin lives in Cirebon, a port city located at 297 kilometers east of Jakarta. To increase the family income, Saefudin works as a mobile dealer. He joined Ruma because he wanted to increase his income, and he feels very excited about expanding his business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers. 

Saefudin is starting to process electricity bill payments for his customers, which is a much needed service in the area and will increase his income. To provide this new service, Saefudin is required to print out receipts for customers. A Kiva loan will enable him to purchase this printer and offer this new service.

loans.use: To purchase a printer to process bill payments

loans.name: Kingugi Group

texts.en:
Zainabu, aged early forties, is married and has two school-aged children. She has been running a mama lishe business for five years now. Zainabu works from 4 am to 4 pm daily and is able to make a good profit each month.

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her second loan request which she will use to buy food cooking ingredients for her mama lishe. She used the previous loan, which she repaid back successfully, to buy food cooking ingredients for her mama lishe. Zainabu earned an extra income which she used to cover school fees and household expenses. She desires to manage a grocery business. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Kingugi" which consists of five members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy food cooking ingredients for her mama lishe.

loans.name: Ivshinkhorol

texts.en:
Ivshinkhorol, 46 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Their daughter has just graduated from university and is now looking for a job. Their son is a third year student at university.

She and her husband make and sell furniture to local people at the outdoor market. Ivschinkhorol is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy equipment such as a circular saw, a power drill and a tape measure for their business. As their current equipment has become outdated and worn out, it is necessary to get some good new equipment in order to maintain their product quality level. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who is striving for a better future.

loans.use: to buy equipment such as a power drill and a circular saw

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina es una joven madre de familia, tiene 24 años de edad y vive en San Martin junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde muy joven ha apoyado a su familia trabajando en la chacra junto a sus padres y ahora que ya tiene su propia familia se está dedicando junto a su esposo al cultivo de plátano Inguiri en unos terrenos que tienen y les va muy bien porque siempre se esfuerzan por ofrecer excelentes productos.
Carolina está muya agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar insumos orgánicos para sus cultivos y de esta manera obtener una producción de calidad en la etapa de cosecha. Así sus ingresos mejorarán y Carolina seguirá esforzándose para ampliar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Carolina is a young mother who is 24 years old.  She lives with her family in San Martin.  She is a person who has a strong desire to get ahead.  Ever since she was young she supported her family, working on the farm with her parents.  Now that she has her own family, she works alongside her husband cultivating Inguiri bananas on some land that they have.  This business is doing very well, because they always work hard so that they can have excellent products to sell.

Carolina is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because with the support they are providing she will be able to buy organic supplies for her crops so that she can get a good quality production at the harvest season.  This way, her income will increase, and Carolina will continue to exert herself to expand her farm.

loans.use: to buy organic supplies for her banana crops

loans.name: Magnolia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Magnolia viene de una larga tradición  de cría de ganado porcino pues sus antepasados siempre se dedicaron a esta profesión y ella hoy en día los honra ejerciendo dicha labor. 
Es madre de 4 hijos de 26, 21, 16, 14 y gracias a dios los tiene a todos estudiando. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de una cerda de cría que vale 700.000$ colombianos y el resto de dinero lo invertirá en concentrado para alimentarlo adecuadamente.
Sueña con tener una granja porcina donde tenga un seguro asegurado, pues a sus 45 años de edad ya piensa en ahorrar para su vejez y seguir apoyando incondicionalmente a sus hijos y futuros nietos.
texts.en:
Magnolia comes from a long tradition of raising and breeding pigs; her ancestors always made a living this way, and now she exercises this honored labor as well.

She is the mother of four children, aged 26, 21, 16, and 14; and, thank god, each one is currently studying. She is asking for the loan in order to buy a baby pig, valued at 700,000 colombianos, and the rest of the money she will invest in feed to nourish it properly.

She dreams of having a pig farm where she can be safely insured; even though she is only 45 years old, she is already thinking about saving for her retirement and being able to continue supporting his children and future grandchildren unconditionally.

loans.use: to buy a baby pig and food, which is very necessary because her current pig is very hold and will be sold soon.

loans.name: Nvard

texts.en:
Nvard lives with her husband and two children (daughter, 20-years-old and son, 16-years-old). Nvard works at a local canned food factory and her husband does seasonal migrant work.
 
Nvard has also been running a farm for 10 years. The farm includes livestock of cows, pigs and hens. Nvard also cultivates wheat and potatoes and sells the gathered harvest to local retailers.
 
The requested loan of USD 2,500 is very important for her to purchase forage for feeding the livestock (barley, combined feed) and maintain the farm. 

Nvard hopes for lenders' support for her farming business.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock (barley, combined feed).

loans.name: Munkhzul

texts.en: Mr. Munkhzul is 42 years old and lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been selling automobile spare parts since 2011. Using his previous loan, he bought large amounts of spare parts for the purpose of avoiding inventory shortage. Now he is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to buy an electric car in order to transport spare parts to clients for extra income. As his children are growing bigger each passing day, he is working hard to provide for their needs. Also, the electric car contributes to clean air by emitting harmless pollutants and wasting less fuel.

loans.use: to buy an electric car in order to deliver spare parts to clients

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Victor es divorciado, vive en El Alto en casa que es de sus familiares y  trabaja como contador en una empresa de transporte y tambien debe apoyar a su madre económicamente, la señora vive con él. Necesita crédito para comprar un mueble, especificamente un escritorio para su hogar, donde pueda trabajar con mayor comodidad cuando se lleve el trabajo a casa Victor es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Victor is divorced and lives in El Alto in a home that belongs to his family. He works as an accountant for a transportation company, and also financially supports his mother, who lives with him.

He needs this loan in order to buy furniture, specifically a desk, for his home. He will use it to work more comfortably when he works from home. Victor is the only source of income for his household, which is why he needs your help.

loans.use: to buy furniture, specifically a desk, for his home.

loans.name: Rudy William

texts.es: Rudy de 19 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a sus padres y su hermano. Él es un hombre emprendedor que se desempeña como jornalero, además buscando mejorar un poco la calidad de vida de su familia siembra diferentes hortalizas de las cuales deja cierta cantidad para el consumo y la otra la vende logrando un ingreso extra. Rudy desea ampliar su vivienda ya que como se puede observar en la fotografía esta es bastante pequeña, además desea encementar  el piso de la misma. Por lo anterior Rudy está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada,  madera, cemento, arena y grava para ampliar su vivienda y encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en:
Rudy is 19 years old and lives in his own house next to his parents and brother. He is an enterprising young man who works as a day laborer. In searching for a way to improve somewhat the quality of life of his family and himself, he plants a variety of vegetables, some for family consumption and the rest to market for added income.

Rudy wants to expand his home, since as one can see in the photograph, it is quite small. In addition, he wants to cover the existing dirt floor with cement. To do all this, Rudy is requesting a loan through FUSAI to purchase: galvanized sheets, lumber, cement, sand and gravel to expand his house and cement the floor.

loans.use: buy galvanized steel, lumber, cement, sand and gravel to expand his residence and cover the dirt floor with cement.

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.es:
Tatiana es una mujer de 30 años de edad, soltera madre de un hijo y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es emprendedora, fuerte, luchadora, constante, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en el mercado Guapuru de su ciudad. Este mercado se caracteriza por la oferta de productos alimenticios y esto hace que desde todas las latitudes de la ciudad los consumidores lleguen para abastecerse. El comercio en este centro se realiza principalmente en las afueras del comercial, en puestos pequeños donde se ofrecen verduras y frutas con buenos precios. Aunque también cuenta con secciones en las que se puede comprar de todo, desde ropa hasta artículos de limpieza.
Tatiana es de tez morena, cabello largo negro, se viste a la moda y su lengua natal es el español. Ella aprendió a cocinar por herencia familiar; y conoce toda clase de platos típicos de su región, también aprendió a manejar toda clase de alimentos, sabe cómo combinarlos, puede hacer comidas deliciosas así parezcan muy difíciles y crea sus propias recetas utilizando toda su imaginación, claro que no siempre todo resulta divertido, en ocasiones tiene que quedarte pelando días enteros el mismo alimento o haciendo la misma labor por semanas.
Ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la construcción de un cuarto en su casa para abrir un pequeño restaurante y con los beneficios darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Es por esos motivos que Tatiana solicita un préstamo para la construcción de un cuarto y abrir un pequeño restaurante.
texts.en:
Tatiana is a 30 year old woman, and a single mother of one child. She makes a living selling food.

She is entrepreneurial, strong, a fighter, consistent, responsible, and very hardworking. Her business is located in the Guapuru market in her city. This market is known for their supply of food, so customers come from all latitudes of the city in order to stock up. The trade in the market is mostly on the outskirts of the commercial businesses, in small stalls where they sell vegetables and fruits at good prices. There are also certain sections where you can buy almost everything, from clothing to cleaning products.

Tatiana has a dark complexion, long black hair, dresses fashionably, and speaks Spanish as her first language. She learned to cook from her family; she knows how to make all the common dishes of the region, though she has learned how to handle all different kinds of food. She knows how to combine different foods, and is able to make delicious foods that seem very difficult by making her own recipes and using her imagination. However, it's true that this business is not always fun...on some occasions she has to peel the same food for days or do the same work for weeks.

She wants to grow her business by building a room in her house to open up a small restaurant. With her earnings, she will give a better quality of life to her family. This is Tatiana's motivation in asking for the loan in order to build a room and open a small restaurant.

loans.use: to build a room and open up a small restaurant.

loans.name: Luvuno

texts.en:
Luvuno appreciated the previous loan that helped her to expand her business.

For the past eight years, she has been operating a mat-weaving business, selling door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces the major challenge of seasonality. With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase paints and sewing materials.

She dreams of expanding and establishing a poultry business in the future. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase paints and sewing materials

loans.name: Chinyavu

texts.en:
Chinyavu is married and has been blessed with two children. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

For the past four years, she has operated a retail shop, selling household consumables to local customers. She faces the major challenge of high cost of transportation in her place of operation. 

With the Kshs 50,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans, maize flour, soft drinks. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans, maize flour, soft drinks

loans.name: Erdenebazar

texts.en:
Erdenebazar, 52 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife has retired and gets state pension. 

He has been making and selling wooden crafts to local people from his workshop.  Erdenebazar is very hardworking individual and people like to buy his wooden crafts as they are high quality.  

He is requesting a loan of 4000000 MNT to buy wood in large amounts in order to store raw materials for later use.

loans.use: to buy wood in large amounts in order to run his wooden crafts business

loans.name: Varditer

texts.en:
Varditer lives in Byuravan village with her parents-in-law, husband and three children.   Varditer, hairdresser by profession, runs a farm.  With the help of her parents-in-law she is involved in agriculture and the cultivation of cabbage in their greenhouse.  Varditer's husband is an army officer, but his salary alone isn't enough for covering family's daily needs.  Thus, the farming business helps the family to earn additional income and sustain their living expenses. 


The requested loan of USD 3000 is very important for Varditer and her family to purchase fertilizer for cabbage, feed for the livestock, and most important, to pay for the renovation of their greenhouse.


Please help this hardworking woman and her family with this loan.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of her greenhouse, buy fertilizer for cabbage and feed for the livestock

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel de 48 años de edad, estudio hasta 7° grado tubo que abandonar sus estudios debido al conflicto armado que azoto el país, debido a la edad que él tenía no podía asistir a la escuela ya que manifiesta que los reclutaban para ir a pelear, así que su familia tuvo que irse de la zona donde habitaban.

 Esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos, una niña de 8 años que estudia 1° grado y un niño de 4 años que aún no estudia por su edad; pero el próximo año iniciara con sus estudios, de él dependen su compañera de vida, sus dos hijos y su mamá que por su avanzada edad él la cuida. 

Miguel se dedica a la agricultura desde que era un niño, ya que al no poder estudiar más su padre lo llevaba a trabajar la tierra, desde que era un niño él ha aprendido a ganarse el pan de cada día, además de trabajar en la agricultura,  trabaja como ayudante de albañil o como jornalero, es una persona luchadora, que debe trasladarse de su casa a donde trabaja camina 2 kilómetros, debido a que el transporte es escaso hacia donde él viaja y tiene que hacerlo a pie, tiene que madrugar a diario para estar a tiempo en su trabajo.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar cemento, bloque, arena y madera para terminar la construcción de su vivienda, ya que se acerca la temporada fuerte de lluvias y él quiere tener terminada su vivienda antes que esto pase, teniendo el dinero en mano el podrá comprar todo de una sola vez y hacer un solo viaje en el carro que le trasladara el material, para de esta manera tener un pequeño ahorro en el traslado de los materiales.

Él desea construir una casa más grande y que sea toda de bloque, ya que con la que actualmente cuenta es mixta tiene bloque y adobe, con esto él espera darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia que ellos tengan una mejor higiene, además desea darles la educación que él no pudo tener cuando era un niño por los problemas del conflicto armado.
texts.en:
Miguel, 48, studied up to seventh grade. He had to quit school due to the armed conflict that devastated the country. He could no longer go to school, he shares, because at his age the children were recruited to fight, therefore his family had to leave the area where they lived. 

He is in a relationship and has two children, a girl of 8 in first trade, and a boy of 4 not yet in school due to his age but entering school next year. Miguel has as dependents his life partner, his two children, and his mother of advanced years whom he takes care of. 

Miguel has worked in agriculture since childhood. Since he could no longer go to school, his father took him to work the land, and he learned to earn his daily bread. Additionally, he works as mason's helper or day laborer. He is a hard-working man who must walk to work, two kilometers from his home, because transportation is scarce. He has to get up at dawn daily to be at work on time.

He is requesting a loan from CrediCampo to buy cement, cinder blocks, sand and wood, to finish building his home. The season of strong rains is approaching and he wants the home finished in good time. Having cash in hand he will be able to buy all material together and have it transported in one vehicle, so that he may save a little in transport costs. 

He would like to build a bigger, all-concrete home, his current one is a mix of concrete and adobe. In this way he hopes to give his family a better quality of life with better hygiene. He also wants to give them the education that he could not have as a child because of the armed conflict problems.

loans.use: to buy cement, cinder blocks, sand and wood to finish building his home.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is an 18-year-old, single young man from a village near Jenin city. He lives with his parents in a very simple house. His father is a teacher and he earns a low income which is not enough to cover all the family's needs. Ahmad works as a construction worker and he supports his family by paying part of their expenses.

Ahmad would like to improve his family's living conditions by buying all the things they need. Therefore he has taken out a USD loan from FATEN to help him to buy a solar energy system for heating water, so that he can provide hot water for his family with lower electricity costs.

Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system for heating water.

loans.name: So

texts.en:
So is 51 years old, married and has three dependant children and three married children. He lives in a community in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. He is a farmer on a small farmland located near his house. On his farmland, he grows rice and sells the crops to local dealers and customers at market. So far, he has been involved in this career for fifteen years with an average income of USD 7.00 a day. 

So wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in his house now.  Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine and pay for its upkeep.  By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Turdukan

texts.ru: Турдукан 51 год, замужем, есть взрослый сын, который находится на заработках за рубежом. Основным источником дохода для Турдукан является животноводство и полеводство. Начав этот бизнес в 1985 году, на сегодняшний день у Турдукан в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 20 овец, 4 лошади. Также имеется земельный надел мерою 0,31 ГА, где Турдукан выращивает кукурузу. В целях увеличения поголовья скота Турдукан обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для дальнейшего откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита она планирует направить на завершение строительства своего дома.
texts.en: Turdukan is 51, married, and has an adult son who works abroad. Her main source of income comes from livestock and crops. She started her business in 1985 and currently has three cows, twenty sheep, and four horses. She also has a 0.31 hectare plot of land where she plants corn. With the goal of expanding her business, Turdukan applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to purchase cattle to fatten and resell. She plans to use the profits to complete construction on her home.

loans.use: To purchase additional livestock in order to invest in the continued growth of her business

loans.name: Maria Felicia

texts.es:
Maria una mujer de 33 años de edad, llena de sueños y aspiraciones en su vida como sacar adelante a sus dos hijos de 8 y 5 años, mejorar su calidad de vida y tener una casa propia, se dedica a la cría y levante de pollos de engorde y gallinas.

Esta actividad la realiza desde aproximadamente 5 años y es un gran apoyo para el sostenimiento de su hogar, por eso siempre trata de trabajar con todas las energías y dedicación constante.

Con este trabajo ha intentado salir adelante junto con su familia y es por eso que solicita un aliento económico para realizar la compra de algunas gallinas ponedoras que le permitan capitalizar su negocio y tener una mejor rentabilidad.

Su mayor sueño es poder ver a sus hijos graduados y todos los días se esmera para que este sueño se cumpla.
texts.en:
Maria, a 33-year-old woman, is full of dreams and aspirations in life, like getting her two children, eight and five years old, ahead, improving their quality of life, and having her own home. She makes a living raising broiler chickens and hens. She has been doing this work for approximately five years, and it is a great help in supporting her household. That is why she always tries to work energetically and with constant dedication.

With this work, she has tried to get ahead with her family and that is why she is requesting economic support, in order to buy some laying hens, so she can invest in her business and be more profitable. 

Her biggest dream is to be able to see her children graduate, and every day she puts a lot of effort into turning that dream into a reality.

loans.use: to buy laying hens for the good of her business and to get ahead with her children.

loans.name: Muhammad Waseem

texts.en:
Muhammad Waseem is 28 years old and lives in Kotri.  He runs a general store in his community.  He makes sure that he is not short of stock and serves his customers well. 

He is ambitious about his business and wishes increase it by buying additional items that are more in demand.  Also, he wants to make sure that customers do not go to other shops due to shortages or the unavailability of a particular item at his shop.  This will help him attract more customers and increase his sales.  Therefore, he has requested a loan to help him buy these items.  

He dreams to become a successful business man.

loans.use: To purchase additional items for his general store.

loans.name: Hameed

texts.en: Hameed is a young and hardworking businessman from Kotri. He is 35 years old and married. He buys material for his store from wholesalers in the local market and then resells it. He wishes to buy additional food items for his store in order to avoid any out of stock situations, as well as items that are currently unavailable at his store. Due to a shortage of money he has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, a Kiva partner to help him to increase his business.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items for his store.

loans.name: Five Brothers Group

texts.en:
Amiri, who is in his late forties, is married with three children, all of whom are still at school.  

He has been running a retail shop for 20 years.  He works from 6.30am to 09pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be Amiri's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He will use this loan to increase the shop's inventory. He dreams of making his shop international.

Amiri will share this loan with his loan group "FIVE BROTHERS" which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the shop inventory.

loans.name: Bayanjargalan

texts.en: Mr. Bayanjargalan, 34 years old, lives with his mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been selling DVDs and CDs to local people at a trade center. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy DVDs in large amounts from a China border city in order to run his business without worrying about inventory shortage. He wants to make his mother happy by living well and succeeding in his business.

loans.use: to buy DVDs and CDs in large amounts.

loans.name: Ega

texts.en:
Ega is a married woman and has three children who attend school. Her husband is a policeman and together they own a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

Ega has operated a carpentry business for the past 6 years. Her potential clients are neighbors and passersby. She dreams of establishing a hardware shop in the future. 

With the Kshs 50,000 she wants to purchase materials and machinery for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials and machinery for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pigs to raise, which will allow him to improve production and thus his family's quality of life.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a quality breed of dairy cow

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en: Saumu is a married woman age 30 years. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.  For the past five years, she has operated a food stall business, selling from home to local neighbors. She faces a major challenge of delayed payments.  She dreams of expanding to a café business in the future.  With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice, maize flour, and sugar. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice, maize flour, and sugar.

loans.name: Ana Yanira

texts.es:
Ana de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, la falta de escuelas en el cantón donde Vivian no le permitió seguir con su aprendizaje, ya que los que enseñaban eran personas particulares que se solidarizaban con el aprendizaje de la niñez,  al ya no asistir a la escuela se dedicó de lleno a apoyar a su padres con los trabajos de la casa. Está casada su pareja es transportista, tiene un vehículo en el que realiza viajes a quienes lo busquen, todas sus hijas están con ella en la casa, nadie estudia. En casa también viven tres nietos quienes son de las hijas que están en casa. 

Ella tiene un puesto de venta de tortillas, las que ella con la ayuda de sus hijas las elaboran y es su principal fuente de ingresos, tiene más de 15 años de dedicarse al negocio; poniendo en práctica todo lo que había aprendido cuando estaba en casa se decidió a poner el puesto, lo que por hoy ya es bien reconocida en la colonia y tiene muy buena clientela, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, el negocio lo tiene en su casa por lo que atiende de las 7:00 am a 4:00 pm. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar maíz, cal, leña, para la elaboración de las tortillas. La necesidad que se satisface es el que pueda tener siempre lo principal para día con día estarle dando cumplimiento a sus clientes.

Los sueños que tiene es poder crecer siempre en las ventas mantener la clientela y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que podrá cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia. Las ganancias serán invertidas en el pago de la cuota y ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Ana is 45 years old, and she studied until third grade.  The lack of schools in the area that they lived in did not allow her to continue her education since the people who taught in the area focused on early childhood education.  Since she was not attending school, she dedicated herself to helping her parents with the household work.  She is married, and her husband works as a driver.  He has a vehicle that he uses to transport anyone who seeks him.  All of her daughters are at home with her since they do not attend school.  In their home, three of her grandchildren also live with them.

She has a stall where she sells tortillas, which she makes with the help of her daughters.  This is her primary source of income.  She has been working in this business for over 15 years.  She started the business by putting into practice everything that she learned when she was at home.  Today, she is very well-known in the town and she has a great customer base.  She does not work in another business.  Her business is run from her home, and she works from 7am to 4pm.

The loan that she is seeking from Credicampo will be used to purchase corn, lime and firewood to make tortillas.  This loan will ensure that she has all of the necessary supplies to provide for her customers every day.  Her dreams are to be able to continue increasing her sales, maintain her customer base, and with this have greater earnings, which will allow her to cover the needs of her and her family.  The earnings will be used to pay back this loan and expand her business.

loans.use: purchase corn, lime, and firewood to make tortillas.

loans.name: Forkland Group

texts.en:
Rehema, in her early forties, is the mother of three school children.. She has been running a food business commonly known as mamalishe. She works from 5 am to 1pm every day and is able to make a good profit each month.  Through hard work, she managed to earn enough to buy a plot of land and pay for household expenses.  In the coming years, Rehema would like to build a house for her family. 

 
Rehema will use this loan to buy buy food cooking ingredients for her mamalishe business. She will share this loan with her loan group, "FORKLAND", which consist of three members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. 

This is her tenth loan cycles via Kiva partner, Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans, all of which she repaid successfully, to buy food items like rice, sugar, cooking oil and charcoal.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her mamalishe (food stall).

loans.name: Llesh

texts.en:
This is Llesh, who is requesting this loan from Kiva lenders to buy a new engine for the school bus he operates.  He wants to have it ready before the start of the new school year.   He transports the kids from two villages to the city of Lezha for their schooling.  

While Llesh drives the school bus, his wife works in agriculture/livestock.  They live in a village and as per his wife’s saying, it is the best activity that a villager can pursue.  She plants, harvests and sells wheat and corn in large quantities and also seasonal veggies, though at a smaller scale.  Fruit orchards like pears, apples, oranges and tangerines trees are planted on their land as well. In addition to all these, she has eight pigs and sheep and she sells the dairy and baby animals for cash.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for the school bus he operates so it will be ready before school starts.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
La agricultura es una actividad solamente apta para toda aquella persona que ama la tierra como a una madre, como una engendradora de futuros para la vida.  Buenos futuros de esperanzas para generaciones siguientes, de 42 años de edad que tiene cuatro hijos que son buenos estudiantes en la escuela de la comunidad donde el vive.

La actividad que el dignamente realiza bajo un sol agotador es de agricultor, la producción que el realiza es la siembra de papas, zanahorias, repollos y maíz que para el es un buen campo para generar buenos ingresos económicos para el sostenimiento de su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y comunidad. La segunda actividad que realiza es de jornalero en los alrededores de la comunidad.

El uso respectivo que el dará al crédito gestionado es para la compra de  de semillas de papas y la compra de fertilizantes orgánicos para así tener una buena cosecha y poner a las disposición sus productos de la mejor calidad a su comunidad. Uno de las aspiraciones de Juan es la compra de mas terrenos para la aplicación de sus cultivos que el realiza y ver que sus hijos se  convierten en profesionales en los diferentes campos de la vida.
texts.en:
Agriculture is an activity that is only suitable for people who love that Earth as if it were a mother, a producer of futures for life.  He is 42 years old and has four children who are good students in the school where they live.  The job that he performs with dignity under a blistering sun is farming.  He produces potatoes, carrots, cabbage and corn, which for him are a good source of income with which to sustain his family. and improve their living conditions.  He also works as a day laborer around the community.

He will use this loan to purchase potato seeds and purchase organic fertilizers so that he can have a good harvest and provide better quality produce to his community.  Juan's aspirations are to purchase more land to grow his crops, and to see his children become professional in different fields.

loans.use: Purchase potato seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for cocoa and plantain crops.

loans.name: Fawzi

texts.en:
Fawzi is a 29-year-old single man, living with his family in Mokala city, Yemen. Fawzi has a University education. Because of high rates of unemployment in the country, Fawzi couldn't find a job to look after his family. He doesn't surrender to his condition, but strives strongly to improve the living condition of his family. He is very respected and a personal young man and knows how to run his life well. Most Yemeni young people who graduated from the universities couldn't find jobs to look after their families. Fawzi is one of those young people, but he didn't surrender to that miserable condition. As a result, he decided to start his own business through opening a small shop to sell different kinds of food materials and merchandise for the local residents inside his area where he lives with his family. He has rented a small store in his area for one year and decided to make it a grocery. This grocery needs preparation from the inside to be more attractive to customers. The grocery doesn't have the basic decor. For this reason, he didn't open it officially. Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money for that. For this reason, Fawzi applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to buy decor to prepare his grocery from the inside to open it officially in order to attract a lot of customers. 

Fawzi looks forward to expanding his grocery more through purchasing all kinds of merchandise to be able to meet all the demands of the customers. His dream in the future is opening a restaurant in the center of Mokala city.

loans.use: to buy a decor to prepare his grocery from the inside in order to attract a lot of customers.

loans.name: Liliana Patricia

texts.es:
Liliana una muy emprendedora mujer, que ha base de esfuerzo y trabajo duro y claro con la ayuda de los prestamista como los encontrados en kiva gente de buen corazón logro montar una peluquería pero con una particularidad ye s que están tan entregada al trabajo y tan comprometida con su progreso que tiene servicio a domicilio.

10 años de experiencia son los que tiene como estilista y 3 créditos con excelente hábito de pago son su aval para demostrarle a los prestatarios que pueden confiar en la puntualidad de pago de sus cuotas. 
 
Sus servicios a domicilios han sido todo un éxito pero para Liliana representa un gran gasto en transporte pues nunca le dice que no a ningún cliente pro más lejos que quede por eso quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de una moto para desplazarse y poder cubrir en el día un mayor número de clientes. 

El crédito será de gran ayuda pues podrá desplazarse y llegar  a un mayor número de clientes por día obteniendo mayores ganancias y asegurando primeramente las cuotas del crédito.
texts.en:
Liliana is a very entrepreneurial woman who has worked hard and clearly with the help of lenders like those in Kiva, people with good hearts.  She was able to open a barbershop, but one with a particular specialty in that she offers in-home service.

She has been doing this for 10 years and has had three loans with an excellent repayment record, showing the lenders that they can trust her to be on time with her payments.

In-home services have been very successful for Liliana but this includes some high transportation costs because she never turns down customers, no matter how far away they are.  She is asking for a loan to buy a motorcycle so she can cover a greater number of customers each day.

The loan will be of great help because she will be able to travel and cover a greater number of customers and increase her earnings, making loan repayment a priority.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 19-year-old single young man from Hebron city.  He lives with his family in a small, simple house.  His father is a worker with a low income.  This is the only source of income to the family.  Mahmoud is a student in a local university where he studies Finance.  He would like to finish his studies and find a job in the future.

Mahmoud took a USD loan from FATEN.  This loan will help him to pay university expenses for this semester.  By taking this loan, Mahmoud will be able to finish his study faster and find a job. 

Mahmoud appears in the photo

loans.use: to pay university expenses for this semester

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema appreciates for the previous loan that helped her expand her business. 

Rehema has operated a water vending business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business. Her dream is to have large amounts of water storage in the near future.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase a water tank for storing fresh water to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank for storing fresh water to sell

loans.name: Norma Lizeth

texts.es: Norma de 24 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 2 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que desde hace 3 años se desempeña como vendedora de verduras actividad que realiza en el mercado central de manera ambulante, y la cual le ha permitido apoyar con la economía familiar. Norma desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que las láminas se encuentran deterioradas provocando que sus pertenencias se mojen con  la lluvia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Norma, 24 years old, lives in her own home with her life partner and their two-year-old son. She is an enterprising woman who for the last three years has worked as a mobile vegetable vendor at the main market. This has allowed her to help with the family finances. 

Norma wants to replace the roof on her home because the sheets are dilapidated, causing her belongings to get wet when it rains. So she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to replace the roof on her home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to replace the roof on her home.

loans.name: Hector Manuel

texts.es:
El señor Héctor es un carpintero y ebanistería que apenas está iniciando con sus labores pues en su trabajo anterior no ganada los recursos suficientes para mantener a su familia de 2 hijos de 15 y 11 años de edad y a su pareja.

Consciente de esta situación decidió solicitar a la corporación un voto de confianza para pedirle un cerdito que le permita comprar herramienta de trabajo para seguir proyectándose y creciendo en su profesión.

El cerdito ser invertido en la compra de un taladro, una pulidora de madera, triple y madera para operar. 

Su sueño es seguir creciendo y apoyando a su familia quiere ser más reconocido en el sector. Prestar muchos servicios y poder mejorar las condiciones de su familia
texts.en:
Hector is a carpenter and cabinetmaker who has just begun his business, because in his previous job, he did not earn enough to take care of his family of two children, who are 15 and 11 years old, and his partner. 

Because of this situation, he decided to request a vote of confidence in the form of a loan, which will allow him to buy tools so that he can continue making his work visible and growing his business. 

The loan will be invested in the purchase of a drill, a wood polishing machine, triple, and wood. 

His dream is to continue growing and supporting his family. He wants to be more renowned in the area, to offer many services, and to be able to improve his family’s conditions.

loans.use: to buy a drill, wood polishing machine, triple, and wood to continue growing his business since he is still very new in the market.

loans.name: Bajram

texts.en:
In the photograph is Bajram, the client, and Fazilet, his wife, along with their 29-year-old son who was born with a disability and who insisted on being in the photo.  Their other son works for the city.

They live in a very rural village, almost on top of the mountain, with very beautiful vistas.  There are only a few families living in houses built of stone, while the rest of them have left the village over the past 20 years.  The are lots of oak trees and a river running through the village as well as lots of wild rabbits running around. In the winter is extremely cold and snowy, whereas in the summer is cool.   

Bajram is seeking your financial help and compassion for a loan to help pay for his wife’s medical treatment (chemotherapy).  She has been suffering from a serious illness.

loans.use: to pay for his wife's chemotherapy

loans.name: Edith Maribel

texts.es:
Edith  de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, sus padres no la dejaron continuar por lo que no siguió, ya que en ese tiempo  pensaban los papás que era mejor trabajar que estar en la escuela. Es casada  su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tienen tres hijos, el mayor estudia bachillerato, la de 10 años estudia cuarto grado y niña menor no estudia aun. 

Tiene una tienda, donde vende todo tipo de producto para la cocina, es única tienda que hay en la colonia por lo que percibe un ingreso considerado,  sus clientes ya la conocen. Tiene más de cinco años de tener el negocio, la falta de tener ingresos y solo pasar en la casa dedicándose solo a los trabajos domésticos, se dio cuenta que podía darle atención a una tienda, por lo que decidió emprender, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique. El negocio la tiene en la casa, por lo que las salidas que realiza es para surtir la tienda, sus hijos le colaboran al regresar de la escuela a atender el negocio. El horario que atiende es de las 6:00 am a 7:00 pm.      
	

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar aceite por mayor y productos lácteos, la mejora que el préstamo ara es el poder tener capital para trabajar, por lo que cada mes está tramitando crédito. 

Los sueños que tiene es poder crecer siempre en las ventas y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que podrá cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia, espera darles siempre el apoyo a sus hijos para que estudien. Las ganancias serán invertidas en el pago de la cuota y ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Edith, 39 years old, went to school through second grade. Her parents did not let her continue so she did not keep going, because back then parents thought it was better to work than be in school. She is married. Her partner makes a living in agriculture. They have three children. The oldest is in high school, the ten-year-old girl is in fourth grade, and the youngest girl is not in school yet. 

She has a store, where she sells all kinds of products for cooking. It is the only store there is in the neighborhood, so her income is substantial. Her clients know her. She has had the business for more than five years. Not having income and only being at the house doing household chores, she realized that she could tend to a store, so she decided to do that. She does not do any other work.

She has the business at her home, so the expenses she has are for stocking the store. Her children help her tend to the store when they come home from school. The schedule that she works is from 6 a.m. to 7 p.m.

The loan that she is requesting is for the purchase of oil wholesale and dairy products. The improvement that the loan will provide for is that she will be able to have capital to work, which she is accomplishing now by arranging for credit every month.

Her dreams are to always be able to increase sales and thus have higher income with which to be able to cover her and her family's needs. She hopes to always be able to give her children support to study. The earnings will be invested in paying bills and expanding the business.

loans.use: to purchase oil wholesale and dairy products. The improvement that the loan will allow for is that she will be able to have capital to work.

loans.name: Jameth Jose

texts.es:
Jameth desde hace 15 años se dedica a la producción agrícola y diariamente se levanta para trabajar y atender sus tierras en las cuales tiene cultivos principalmente de plátano.

Es una actividad aprendida de manera empírica y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas y habilidades en este campo.

Hoy en día se siente orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir con su esfuerzo y se siente muy agradecido con la vida por las oportunidades que le brinda.

El pide un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, riegos y pesticidas, de este modo mantener sus tierras en optimas condiciones para los cultivos, de esta forma tendrá una mejor producción y mejorara sustancialmente la calidad de vida de su familia.

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y allí poder disfrutar de su vejez al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
For 15 years, Jameth has worked in agriculture. He works daily and takes care of his land, on which he mostly has banana crops.

This is a job that he learned by doing, and little by little he has perfected his techniques and abilities in this field.

Today, he feels proud of what he has built with his efforts, and he feels very thankful to life for the opportunities it has offered. 

He is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizer, irrigation, and pesticides. In this way, he will maintain his land in the optimal conditions for his crops. This will allow him to have a better harvest and to fundamentally improve his family’s quality of life.

His biggest dream is to have a house of his own, and there to be able to enjoy old age with his wife.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, irrigation, and other inputs to prepare his land and improve his banana production.

loans.name: Shaheen

texts.en:
Shaheen lives in Lahore. She is married, and a mother of four. She has a small business sewing clothes. She makes her living by stitching clothes. She is good and skillful at her work. She gets frequent orders for sewing from her clients. 

Due to constant wear and tear, her sewing machine has now depreciated and she wants to replace it with a new one. But she can not afford to buy a new one due to low income. Therefore she has applied for a loan from BRAC Pakistan, a Kiva partner, to help her buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her stitching work

loans.name: Yanira

texts.es: Yanira de 24 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida, el hijo que ha procreado junto a su compañero de vida. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida desde hace 4 años como vendedora de fruta partida, actividad que realiza en su cantón. Yanira desea construir un corredor en su vivienda para lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena y grava para construir un corredor en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yanira, 24 years old, lives in her own home with her life partner and the son that they share. She is an enterprising woman who for the last four years has made a living selling cut fruit among her group of houses.

Yanira wants to build a breezeway at her house, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase cement, sand, and gravel to build a breezeway at her house.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, and gravel to build a breezeway at her house.

loans.name: Maria Elisabeth

texts.es: María de 47 años de edad es madre soltera habita en vivienda propia junto a su hijo de 15 años de edad. Ella es una mujer tenaz que desde hace 6 años se dedica a prestar sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar, lo que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su hijo y apoyarlo en sus estudios. María desea encementar el piso de su vivienda y el corredor de la misma por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava y pagar mano de obra necesaria para encementar el piso de su vivienda.
texts.en: Maria is 47 years old and is a single mother who lives in her own home with her son who is 15 years old. She is a tenacious woman who works in the domestic service industry cleaning houses and this has allowed her to raise her child and support him in his studies. Maria wants to cement the floor and hallway of her house and this is why she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy: cement, sand, gravel and to cover the labor costs necessary to cement the floor of her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel and cover the labor costs necessary to cement the floor of her home.

loans.name: Pastora Del Carmen

texts.es: Pastora del Carmen Mayor de edad casada con dos hijos de los cuales ambos son menores de edad pero uno esta casado y trabaja solo el otro esta bajo su responsabilidad, de origen chinandegana ubicada en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y con muchos deseos de superación en la vida, es que esta microempresaria decide poner su propio negocio el cual consiste en una pequeña truchita(pulperia pequeña) donde ofrece productos de abarroteria en general de consumo diario como son: granos básicos, jabón, gaseosas, hilo, golosinas, huevos, sopas maggis, salsa de tomates, sobres de café, papel higiénicos, sobres de tang, entre otros mas tambien vende frijoles cosidos, sus compras y ventas son al contado, inicia su negocio con dinero y fondos propios porque son productos que todos consumen en cualquier época del año, hoy en día ha venido poco a poco incrementando su inventario para que deje de ser una pequeña truchita y ser una pulperia a pesar de que su negocio esta un poco mas grande que cuando comenzó, inicia si jornada diaria desde muy temprano abriendo las puertas de su negocio para brindarles una buena atención a sus clientes los cuales la conocen muy bien, uno de los sueños de pastora es poder crecer mas en su negocio realizar ciertas mejoras a sus vivienda, por lo que esta solicitando un financiamiento para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su pequeña pulperia en la compra de productos de consumo del hogar como: granos básicos, ajo, frijoles, aceite, detergentes, huevos, shampoo, golosinas gaseosas, entre otros mas, y asi surtir de todo lo que no pueda tener, los productos mas demandantes y asi obtener mas volumen de ingresos y ofertarles mejores precios a sus clientes.-
texts.en: Pastora del Carmen is married with two children of whom one is married and works and the other one is under her responsibility, from chinandeganda origin located in the West part of the country, she is a hardworking and responsible woman with deep aspiration to progress in life.  This micro-entrepreneur decided to start her own business of a small convenience store, where she offers products for daily use such as: basic grains, soap, soda, thread, snacks, eggs, canned soup, tomato sauce, instant coffee, toilet paper, drink mix powder and other.  She also sells cooked beans. Her purchases and sales are both cash based. She started the business with her own money, these are products that everyone uses at all times of year, todays he has been able to increase her inventory slowly so it can be a bigger store.  She starts her daily routine very early in the morning to open the doors of her business and offer good service to her customers who know her very well. One of her dreams after growing the business is to make improvements to her home. She is requesting a loan to invest in working capital and stock her small store and buying products for home consumption such as: basic grains, garlic, beans, oil, detergent, eggs, shampoo, snacks, soda and other items.  This way she will stock with items she doesn’t have or the ones in most demand and this way she will obtain more income as well as offer better prices to her customers.

loans.use: to buy daily consumption products such as: basic grains, garlic, beans, oil, detergent, eggs, shampoo, snacks, soda and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two washing machines to rent out

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Saran

texts.en:
Saran is 28 years old and the mother of two little children, who are currently in school. She lives in a small village in Battambang Province, Cambodia. In the last fourteen years, she has been involved in a farming business, growing rice and selling the crops to local dealers. She is an active and honest rice farmer who makes a net profit of about USD 5.00 per day.

Saran wants to improve the general living conditions of her entire family by having a latrine to us, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine and pay for its upkeep. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Rosinha

texts.en:
Rosinha is requesting a loan of $600 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk, such as  candies, sugar, coffee, detergent, Sagiko, biscuits, water and eggs.  

Rosinha started her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $200. 

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. With loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she will improve her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy candies, sugar, eggs, shampoo, coffee, detergent, Sagiko, biscuits, water and eggs.

loans.name: Nevruze

texts.en:
Nevruze, a 53-year-old villager and a married mother of two, is seeking your financial help to buy a dairy cow. She and her family live in a village located at the foot of a mountain 899 meters in height above sea level, and with a warmer climate in winter compared with the rest of the region known for the bitter cold and snowy six month long winters.  

Nevruze, who gets help from her husband, does agriculture/livestock to earn a living; she’s got cows and sells the dairy to some nearby dairy farms and also baby calves to locals. She also has vineyards, and plants beans in large quantities; their region is known for the largest production of beans, onions and grains, in addition to apples.

loans.use: to add one more dairy cow

loans.name: Geoconda

texts.es: Geoconda es casada, tiene un hijo y vive en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su familia Geoconda vive en La Paz  es empleada de banco y necesita un credito para cancelar la refaccion de su domicilio Geoconda por el momento es la unica que mantiene el hogar y por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Geoconda is married and has one child. They live in a brick and cement house that belongs to the family. Geoconda lives in La Paz and is employed by a bank. She needs the loan to complete the renovation of her home. At this time, Geoconda is the only one supporting her household and this is why she needs help.

loans.use: to renovate her home.

loans.name: Mabel

texts.es: Mabel es madre de cuatro hijos Ella vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su familia Mabel trabaja en un Banco y necesita un credito para cancelar un tratamiento medico Mabel es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar pero esta recuperando su buena salud y se recomienda ayudarle
texts.en: Mabel is the mother of four children. She lives in La Paz in a house made of brick and cement that belongs to her family. Mabel works at a bank and needs a loan to pay for medical treatment. Mabel is the only source of income for her household, but she is recovering her good health and it is recommended that she be helped.

loans.use: to pay for medical treatment.

loans.name: Wilfredo Antonio

texts.es:
Wilfredo es un veterano con mucha experiencia en el campo. 

Es humilde y sencillo, tiene un gran don de gente y energía suficiente para poder cualquier cultivo a producir.

El tiene un cultivo de plátano y yuca el cual trabaja todos los días para vender sus cosechas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Valencia.

Gracias a sus años de experiencia y enseñanzas que le dio su padre desde niño, tiene plena capacidad para trabajar y para asesorar en estos temas a los demás agricultores de la zona que necesiten ayuda con su producción.

El solicita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, semillas de plátano y pesticidas, de esta manera inyectara capital a su actividad y mejorara sus cosechas de una manera significativa.

Tiene mucha fe en su negocio y grandes esperanzas en las personas solidarias que apoyan a los campesinos trabajadores.

Apoya a un humilde agricultor para que pueda sacar adelante sus tierras.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is a veteran with lots of experience in the fields. He is humble and simple and has a way with people and the energy to be able to produce whatever crop. He has banana and yucca crops and works every day to sell his harvest in the marketplace in the town of Valencia.

Thanks to his years of experience and the experience his father game him from childhood, he has the capacity to work and advise the other farmers in the region who need help with their production. 

He requests the loan to buy farming supplies like fertilizer, banana seeds, and pesticides, and in this way, he will inject capital into his work and improve his harvest in a significant way. He has a lot of faith in his business and great hope in the caring people who support the country workers. It supports a humble farmer so that he can move his lands forward.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, irrigation to improve his crops and have better production.

loans.name: Geovani Enrique

texts.es: Geovani de 28 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su padre, su hermana, su cuñado y su sobrino. Él es un hombre responsable que toda la vida ha trabajado como albañil independiente y hace un año empezó a trabajar fijo con una empresa. Geovani desea encementar toda su vivienda ya que en tiempo de lluvias su casa se inunda por lo que necesita solucionar este problema lo antes posible, por lo que solicita un crédito para comprar: cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de toda su vivienda.
texts.en: Geovani is 28 years old and lives in his own home with his father, sister, brother-in-law and nephew. He is a responsible man that has worked as an independent builder most of his life and started working as a permanent employee with a company last year. Geovani wishes to cement the floor in his home, as it floods during the rainy season and he needs to solve this problem as soon as possible. This is why is is requesting a loan to buy cement, sand and gravel to cement the floor in his whole house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to cement his whole home's floor.

loans.name: Bakel

texts.en:
Bakel is a 29-year-old married man with two children, living with them in Haja city, Yemen. His oldest child is 5 years old, and the youngest one is 8 months old. Bakel has a diploma certificate and he is an employee with a small salary. In reality his salary is not enough to cover all the expenses of his family. He lives with his family in his own house. Unfortunately, the house where Bakel and his family live is very far from the place where he works. 

After many years, Bakel decided to purchase a car to use for transportation. His car helped him very much in saving a lot of money that he was paying for transportation from the area where he lives to the place where he works; he uses it to go to any place he wants. 

His car has became old, and now it needs spare parts to work well. Bakel's salary is not enough to purchase the spare parts. For this reason, he applied for a Youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase spare parts for his own car to make it work better. 

Bakel looks forward to purchasing a new taxi, beside his own first car, and work with it as a driver to transport people from one area to another area. That will let him earn a lot of money that will help him in providing his family with a better future.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his own car to make it work better.

loans.name: Nader Enrique

texts.es:
Nader es un campesino de 39 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de plátano y Yuca, cultivos que atiende todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Valencia, Córdoba, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos con los que vela por el bienestar de sus 4 hijos y su esposa. 

Con el apoyo del crédito comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros), con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, con lo que mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos. 

Nader, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Nader is a 39 year-old farmer who is unassuming and hardworking.  He learned to work the fields as a child, thanks to the teachings of his parents.  This has enabled him to make progress.  Today he has banana and cassava fields, and he tends to his crops every day.  He sells his harvests in the market square in the municipality of Valencia, Cordoba.  He also works as a farmhand on various farms in the region so that he can have more income   to provide for the welfare of his 4 children and his wife.

With the support of this loan, he will buy agricultural supplies at wholesale (chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies).  With these supplies he will continue to care for his crops and he will get a better harvest, with which he can generate more income when he goes to sell his crops.
 
With his enterprising spirit, his strength, and tenacity, Nader wants to continue to strive to accomplish his dream of having his own farm where he could cultivate a much greater variety of products.  This way, he could increase the profitability of his business and ensure his financial stability so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, banana seeds, and irrigation supplies

loans.name: Leze

texts.en:
Leze had previously requested your financial help to buy food items and toiletries for the store she's been operating for some years now. In addition to that, she's been pursuing livestock as well as a means for cash. 

Leze is seeking your help again, yet, this time to pay for her son's education fees; he is pursuing his master's degree.

loans.use: To pay the education fees for her son, who is pursuing a master's degree

loans.name: Mafinga Group

texts.en:
Ema Grace is in her mid-40s, married and has three children in school.  For 10 years, she has been managing a grocery business, selling beer, soft drinks and spirits. Ema Grace also operates a medical clinic. She has a few helpers in her business. She works daily from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. and is able to make a good profit each month. 

Through Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her fifth loan which she will use to buy drinks for her grocery business. She used the previous loans, since repaid, to buy drinks for her grocery business and medicine for her medical clinic. She earned extra income which she used to build a house, pay rent for her medical business and pay her children's school fees. She desires to improve her businesses even more. Ema Grace's businesses are helpful to her community. 

She will share this loan with her loan group, Mafinga, which totals four members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy drinks for her grocery business.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 48-year-old married mother of three sons and lives in village near to Jenin city. Her husband is a worker earning a low and unstable income that barely covers all the family needs. Maha and her husband opened a restaurant in the city to improve the family's living conditions. It is a very good business and the demand is high.
Maha took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new refrigerator for her restaurant. By taking this loan, Maha and her husband will be able to improve their business and buy more stock.
Maha appears in the photo in her restaurant

loans.use: to buy a new refrigerator for her restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy: cement, sand, gravel, brick, sheet rock and matting to build a hallway and expand a room of his home.

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es: Lilian de 25 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida, su hermana de 16 años de edad y su hijo de 6 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que todos los días se gana la vida prestando sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar. Lilian desea terminar de construir dos cuartos de su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía estos se encuentran a medio construir, por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: cemento, lámina galvanizada, arena, polines y pines para terminar de construir dos cuartos de su vivienda.
texts.en: Lilian is 25 years old and lives with her husband, her 16-year-old brother and her son who is 6 years old. She is a hardworking woman and every day she works in domestic services cleaning homes. Lilian wants to finish building two rooms of her home, since, as you can see in the photo, they are only half finished. This is why she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy: cement, metal sheeting, sand, roof support and fasteners to finish building two rooms of her home.

loans.use: to buy: cement, galvanized sheeting, sand, roofing supports and fasteners to finish building two rooms of her home.

loans.name: Haja Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 34-year-old Haja Fatmata. She is married and has two children, ages 12 and 9 years old. In 2009, Haja Fatmata established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to contribute greatly to support her home. Working six days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about 1,750,000 leones (SLL) every month from this business. 

Haja Fatmata would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. Haja Fatmata requires a loan in order to buy beer, stout, soft drinks and provisions. She hopes that this loan will help to increase her profit by approximately 700,000 SLL. Fatmata has already opened another shop for her sister to help her in supporting her family. She plans to make a partial payment for a piece of land that she intends to acquire in the near future.

She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy beer, stout, soft drinks and provisions.

loans.name: Selevano

texts.en: Selevano is a widower with five children ages 22, 20, 14, 9, and 7. He has a motorcycle (boda boda) business and also earns income from selling milk. He faces a challenge of competition and long distances to his milk customers but hopes to educate his children. Selevano needs a loan to pay school fees for his children

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Duku

texts.en:
Duku appreciates the previous loan that helped her expand her business. 
	
For the past three years, she has operated a clothes and shoes selling business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of stiff competition in her business. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of Kes 30,000, she wants to purchase bales of clothes and shoes to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy trousers, T-shirts, dresses, sneakers, shoes and other items.

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki is a mother of five school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Riziki has operated a retail shop business for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat flour and maize flour from home to her neighbours. She faces a challenge of delayed payments by creditors in her business. Riziki dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop in the future.

With the Kshs 30,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking fat oil.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking fat oil.

loans.name: Edwin Armado

texts.es:
Edwin de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a hacer los oficios del hogar también es la que se encarga del cuidado de los niños, también hace bordados y los vende con esto contribuye a los gastos del hogar. Tienen dos hijos el mayor tiene 13 años está haciendo quinto grado, la niña aun no asiste a la escuela, junto a ellos vive un sobrino de la esposa. 

Él se dedica a la agricultura, ya tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse a la actividad productiva, su padre por medio de las correcciones que le hacía fue como lo hizo que fuera una persona de bien para la sociedad, él es un líder en la comunidad anda en todo los proyectos que se realizan en la comunidad, por el tipo de actividad de la zona es que se dedican solamente a la agricultura. Edwin ha sido un hombre responsable, a criado a sus 2 hijos responsablemente, el trabajo lo tiene cerca de su casa, el recorrido lo hace a pie, nadie más se dedica a la actividad, y su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am a 10:00 am. Un crédito anterior se tramito con línea kiva, pero le fue mal en la inversión, ya que los cultivos se le secaron por la falta de lluvia y lo quiere intentar de nuevo realizando la siembra.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para pagar el tractor y la mano de obra de quienes le ayudan para la siembra. Hoy quiere volver a sembrar para ver si puede obtener por lo menos lo que consume. La necesidad satisfecha será el tener la oportunidad de volver a realizar la siembra.

Desea poder tener primero lo más necesario para la familia, que sus hijos estudien y se preparen, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad del arrendamiento de la tierra.  Con la prestación de servicio que realiza y con las cosechas del cultivo pagara la cuota del crédito y ahorrara para los gasto de la familia.
texts.en:
Edwin is 35 years old, has studied until 8th grade, and is married. His partner is a housewife and takes care of their kids. She also does embroidery and sells her work to contribute to the household earnings. They have two children; the oldest is 13 years old and is in the 5th grade, and their little girl does not yet attend school. A nephew of his wife’s also lives with them.

Edwin works in agriculture, and he has already worked in this field for 20 years. His father made him a good person with guidance and a good upbringing. Edwin is a leader in his community, and he does community projects with complete effort, since the only work in his area is agriculture. Edwin has been a responsible man and has raised his two children responsibly. His work is close to his house, and he gets to work by foot. No one is more dedicated to the work; he works from 6:00am to 10:00am. He received a previous loan through Kiva, but his investment went poorly, since his crops dried out because of a lack of rain. He now wants to try to realize a new harvest. 

The loan that he is requesting is to pay for the tractor and workmates who help Edwin with the sowing. Now he wants to start sowing again to see if he can grow at least as much as he consumes. His needs will be satisfied if he has the opportunity to start sowing again.

He wants to be able to have, first and foremost, what is necessary for his family, and he wants his children to study and be prepared. He hopes to always work while God grants him health and life. The loan will help him satisfy the terms of his lease of the land. With the benefit of the loan and with the crop harvest, he will pay the loan installments and will save for the family expenses.

loans.use: to pay for the tractor and workmates to help him with the sowing.

loans.name: Rani's Group

texts.en:
Rani is 30 and married; she has four children. She is a housewife and looks after her kids. Her husband has a painting business where he provides white wash services for his customers. He buys the required material from the local market and uses it for white wash purposes.
