He is a hardworking and clever man.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and resell to local residents.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima appreciates the previous loan that helped her expand her business.
For the past four years, she has operated a beauty salon business. Her potential customers are neighbors and college students. She faces a challenge of seasonality, especially during holiday seasons when schools have closed and she experiences a low turnout. 
With the KES 30,000 loan, she wants to purchase supplies for manicures and pedicures, facial kits, relaxing chemicals, shampoo and hair products. She decided to join Yehu because of favorable loan requirements.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for manicures and pedicures, facial kits, relaxing chemicals, shampoo and hair products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Salah

texts.en:
Using the first loan which was given to Salah by Kiva lenders last year, he expanded his business from a phone accessories store to a store for programming and maintaining phones. He warmly thanks Kiva lenders for their first loan that helped him very much in increasing and developing his business, and whose positive effect was an increase in his income. 

After finishing the repayments of all the installments of the first loan, he has applied for a second Youth loan of 100,000 YER from Kiva lenders to purchase a laptop to use in programming phones, thereby helping him to meet all the demands of his customers.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop to use in programming phones to help him meet all the demands of his customers.

loans.name: Aseel

texts.en: Aseel is a university student majoring in languages and she is in her fourth year. She lives with her family in Irbid, Jordan. Her father sells shoes, and she works as a private teacher at her house. Aseel is seeking to finish her studies so that she will be able to register for a master's program. She is requesting a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees as she doesn't have enough money to do so.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en: Hiba is a university student majoring in computer information systems and she is in her second year. She lives with her four family members in Irbid, Jordan. Her father currently works in security. Hiba is planning to get her bachelor's degree in the future so that she can start working in her study field. But she doesn't have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en: Haneen is a 25-year-old single lady living with her family that consists of four members in Irbid, Jordan. She is a university student majoring in Clothes Technology and Fashion, and she is in her first year. Haneen is seeking to open her own sewing workshop and designing clothes in the future after finishing her studies. She is currently seeking a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.en: Jean Pierre is 29, married and has two children, ages 2 and 5. He requests a loan for his tuition fees so that he can get more comfortable and secure during his time of studying. He is willing to repay back the loan. "Thank you all, those willing to support my education," said Jean Pierre.

loans.use: To pay tuition fees for his studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her daughter's upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania is a 21-year-old university student majoring in law, and she is in her fourth year. She is living with her mother and brother in Hashmiya, Jordan. Her father has been deceased since she was young, and her family has been facing financial crisis since his death. 

Rania is planning to get her bachelor's so that she will start working in her study field in order to help her family financially, but she is facing some financial problems in paying her upcoming semester fees. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Betuel

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Matola Província de Maputo tem 25 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos menores de idade dos quais 1 é que frequenta escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É pescador e proprietário de um estabelecimento comercial a mais de 8 anos ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e nos seus negócios, pois com o empréstimo solicitado pretende adquirir um congelador para o seu estabelecimento comercial. Este é o seu 7º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar o seu negócio e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Betuel comes from Matola, province of Maputo. He's 25 years old and married. He has three underage children, one of whom attends school. He doesn't have anyone under his responsibility.
He has been a fisherman and a store owner for over eight years. He earns an income which he uses for household expenses and for his business. With the loan he requested he intends to purchase a freezer for his store. This is his 7th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to expand his business and ensure an education for his children.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer for his store.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
The above picture presents to you Judith, a very dedicated, honest and self-driven farmer. She is 35 years of age and full of energy. She is based in Nyakoe, a remote area in the rich highlands of Kisii. She is a single mother and has single-handedly raised her three children, although not in very good circumstances, but she has always put on a brave face. 

Her primary source of income is selling a variety of food crops and milk. She also engages in some personal business to make ends meet. Dairy farming is a profitable business venture in the Kisii area, and the demand is great. Judith wants to take advantage and diversify her farming by acquiring an exotic breed of dairy cow. She is seeking a loan to buy a quality dairy cow. 

Judith is an enterprising woman and wants not only to buy a cow, but she intends to buy a quality cow that will be producing between 10-20 liters of milk a day. Through the cow she will increase her income levels and also increase her profit margins. Through Juhudi Kilimo, Judith went through financial training and has mastered all aspects of savings. Saved profits will be used in repaying back the loan and increasing her business. 

She intends to start a yoghurt and cream selling business. Increased profits from the loan will also allow her start a bio-gas plant in her compound, hence saving costs spent on fuel. In the long run, Judith will be able to improve her standards of living and secure the future of her children, since she is the only breadwinner.

loans.use: To purchase a quality dairy cow

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: El señor Eduardo y su esposa viven en el municipio de Colomi, el señor se dedica a la agricultura siembra en terreno de 3 Has herencia de sus padres, ya cuenta con bastante experiencia en el rubro, cultiva papa y papaliza, actualmente requiere un crédito para la compra de 1 camión de abono gallinaza y  productos agroquímicos para la siembra del presente año, además quiere comprar una cabeza de ganado vacuno, de esta forma tendrá la oportunidad de aumentar su producción agrícola y asegurar la seguridad alimentaria ya que es época de siembra de los cultivos agrícolas.
texts.en: Eduardo and his wife live in the town of Colmi. He works in flat sowing on 3 hectares of land inherited from his parents. Now he relies on plenty of experience in the title. He grows potatoes and ullucus. Now he needs a loan for the purchase of one truck of poultry manure and agrochemicals for the current year's harvest. In addition, he wants to buy a head of cattle; in this way he will have the opportunity to increase his agricultural production and assure food safety, now that it's the sowing season of agricultural crops.

loans.use: to buy one truck of poultry manure, agrochemicals, and a head of cattle

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 35-year-old, married man with four children who lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is in the transport business with a taxi and motorcycle. He faces challenges of competition and bad roads. Besides that, he hopes to educate all his children to higher levels of learning. Peter needs a loan to buy tires, repair his lorry, and do general servicing.

loans.use: to buy tires, repair his lorry and do general servicing.

loans.name: Tusitukire Wamu Workers Group

texts.en:
The group is located at a fish landing site, and is comprised of 17 members. 

Adams is a married man aged 38 with five children, four of whom attend school. He deals in the fishing business, and also does trading as a side business.   He started his business in 2001 to improve on his standard of living, and also to be self-employed. 

He is taking out the loan to buy a boat for the business.  His clients are people from areas around the landing site and residents. His hope for the future is to build a commercial house, and to buy an engine so that he can provide quality services.  His challenge is bad weather conditions on the lake, like too much wind.  

He describes himself as a hardworking man, who appreciates the services lenders offer.

loans.use: to buy a boat.

loans.name: Nicolás

texts.es:
La tierra ha sido bendecida por manos que les gusta trabajar y cuidarla.  Es un oficio digno de admirar el que hombres se dediquen por años y para toda la vida.  La tierra sin la labor de hombres campesinos dedicados al cultivo de la misma, no daría los frutos que sostienen generalmente a toda generación. Es el trabajo que realiza Nicolás de 46 años casado y que tiene 3 hijos que son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad donde viven.

La actividad que realiza Nicolás todos los días bajo un sol agotador es la agricultura el ha venido realizando dicha actividad durante 25 años, es la actividad que le ha generado ingresos económicos para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. La cosecha que espera sacar este año  son papas para luego venderlo en el mercado de su comunidad.

El uso del préstamo es par la compra de fertilizantes, para poder obtener una muy buena cosecha, para tener un mejor ingreso económico para mejorar aun más las condiciones de vida de su familia y  comunidad. Uno de las más grandes aspiraciones de el es ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales en los diferentes campos laborales y comprar terreno para dejar un bonito recuerdo para sus hijos.
texts.en:
The earth has been blessed by hands that like to work and take care of it. It's a profession, worthy of admiring those men who work it for years and for their whole lives. The earth without the work of farmers dedicated to the care of it wouldn't give the fruits that generally sustain the whole generation. This is the job performed by Nicolás, 46, married, and who has three children who are excellent students at the school of the community where they live. 

The work that Nicolás performs every day underneath a grueling sun is agriculture. He has come to perform this job for 25 years. It's the job that has generated income to improve the living conditions for his family. The harvest that he hopes to reap this year are potatoes to later sell them in the market in his community. 

The use of the loan is to for the purchase of fertilizers, to be able to obtain a very good harvest, to have a better income to improve even more the living conditions of his family and community. One of his greatest aspirations is to see his children become professionals in different fields of work, and to buy land to leave a good memory for his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
A Sra. Rosa de 36 anos de idade, casada e mae de 4 filhos dos quais 3 estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e secundario e 1 sem  idade para frequentar a escola. Ela è empacotadora na empresa de producao de banana a mais de 3 anos.
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construção (blocos, cimento, barrotes, janelas e pagamento de mao de obra.) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa.
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old and married. She has four children, three of whom attend primary and secondary school and one is below school age. She has worked as a packer for a banana company for over three years.
The current loan will be used to purchase construction supplies (bricks, cement, beams, windows) and pay for labor so that she can continue building her house.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (bricks, cement, beams, windows) and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (bricks, cement, beams, sand, rods) and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Eladia Elena

texts.es: Eladia Elena mayor de edad acompañada madre de un pequeño hijo aun bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal; en sus ratos libre le gustar pasar tiempo de calidad con sus familia,por falta de recursos económico no pudo terminar sus estudios debido a que se vio obligada a trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, pero hoy en día es una microempresaria y administradora de su propio negocio el cual consiste en un taller de tortillas donde elabora quintal y medio de Tortillas diario así también tiene ingresos por la venta de Frijoles Cocidos los cuales son treinta libras las que pone a coser diario, sus compras y ventas las realiza al contado, este negocio lo comenzó con dinero y capital propio al ver la demanda que existía en ese entonces en su reparto ya que no habían tortillerías cerca, su jornada diaria empieza desde muy temprano comenzando a lavar el maíz y luego ir a moler para después comenzar a elaborar las deliciosas tortillas las cuales sale después a ofrecer a sus clientes fijos y eventuales, uno de sus sueños es poder crecer en su negocio para tener mas ingresos y utilidades y de esa forma lograr que su hijo puede concluir una carrera profesional, por lo tanto Eladia esta solicitando un financiamiento para invertir en su negocio en la compra de materia prima como: maíz, leña, cal, bolsas plásticas, frijoles, ajos,entre otros al  crecer en su negocio puede comprar a mejores precios a sus proveedores y generar menos gastos pero mejores utilidades .-
texts.en: Eladia Elena is an adult woman who lives with her partner and her young son that she still takes care of. A native of Chinandega in the western part of the country, she's known as a hard-working, responsible woman with desire for self-improvement. In her free time she enjoys spending quality time with her family. Due to a lack of financial resources she was unable to complete her schooling because she had no choice but to start working at a young age to help her parents with household expenses. Currently she's a micro-entrepreneur and manages her own business,  which consists of a tortilla shop where she makes a quintal and a half of tortillas every day. She also receives income from selling cooked beans, of which she makes thirty pounds a day. Her buying and selling is done in cash, and she started this business with her own money and capital when she saw the demand that there was at the time in her area because of the absence of tortilla shops nearby. The work day starts very early, first with washing the corn, then grinding it to start making delicious tortillas that she sells to regulars and occasional customers. One of her dreams is to be able to grow her business to have more income and profit so that her son can get a degree. This is why Eladia is requesting financing to invest in her business by purchasing ingredients such as: corn, firewood, lime, plastic bags, beans, garlic, among other things to grow her business and get better purchase prices from distributors, reducing expenses and increasing profits.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients for making tortillas and selling cooked beans.

loans.name: Good Hope Group

texts.en:
Adelina, who is in her early 20s, is single. She has been selling charcoal for three years, now. She works from 8:00AM to 7:00PM daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Adelina's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use it to buy sacks of charcoal and meet her customers' demand. She dreams of owning a very big charcoal go-down.

Adelina will share this loan with her loan group, Good Hope, which is comprised of ten members. The members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand his small wood workshop.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Carmen es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada al negocio propio que es la venta de ropa escolar, camisas para mujer, pantalones de hombre, zapatos de mujer  y de hombre, sandalias, lentes, paraguas, etc.  Actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años.
Doña Carmen sus  ventas las realiza desde su casa de habitación  contando con  los clientes principales de la zona del municipio de donde vive, solicita el préstamo para la compra de ropa escolar, zapatos, pantalones, blusas, sandalias, etc. para poder surtir su negocio porque se acerca la temporada de la independencia y las personas se preparan para comprar ropa y zapatos. Espera que esta inversión le sea de mucha ayuda para obtener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante con su familia.
Doña Carmen  su sueño es poder expandir su negocio a través de las ganancias. 

Danlí, Honduras - Agosto  2014
texts.en:
Carmen is an entrepreneurial woman engaged in her own business which is the sales of school clothes, blouses, trousers, shoes for men and women, sandals, eyeglasses, umbrellas, etc. She has been in this business for three years, selling from her home to the main clients of the area of town where she lives. 

She is requesting the loan to buy school clothes, shoes, trousers, blouses, sandals, etc., to stock up her business because independence day shopping is coming up and people are getting ready to buy clothing and shoes. She hopes that this investment will be of great help to generate the income needed to get ahead with her family.  

Carmen's dream is to expand her business with the profits.

loans.use: to buy school clothes, shoes, trousers, blouses, sandals, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Lino

texts.es: El señor lino es soltero, nacio en la ciudad de la paz pero ya que sus condiciones economicas no eran favorables con la ayuda de sus parientes fue a establecerse en la localidad de entre rios hace aproximadamente 2 años, buscando una oportunidad de trabajo, actualmente vive en la casa de un pariente lejano se dedica a la construccion, tiene 1 año y 2 meses de experiencia como maestro albañil, con el tiempo empezo a ganar mas dinero con lo cual logro comprar un terreno urbano. Ahora se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un credito para la construccion de su casa de esta forma tendra mejor calidad de vida y mayor espacio para vivir comodamente.
texts.en:
Lino is single. Born in the city of La Paz, but since his economic conditions weren't favorable, with the help of his family, he went to take up residence in the locality of Entre Ríos approximately 2 years ago, looking for a work opportunity. Now he lives in the house of a distant family member. 

He works in construction. He has 1 year and 2 months of experience as a master builder. With time he started to earn more money with which he could buy an urban plot of land. Now he sees the need to ask for a loan for the construction of his house. In this way he will have a better quality of life and more space to live comfortably.

loans.use: to build his house

loans.name: Evaline

texts.en:
Hello world! Meet Evaline, a mother of four, from Litein, a remote village in the Rift Valley province of Kenya. She has spent the past 22 years of her life farming. She sells milk, tea, and vegetables produced on her farm. She also engages in personal business, to make ends meet.

Evaline is a go-getter and has a great desire to succeed in life. Of all the activities she involves herself in, dairy farming is closest to her heart. She enjoys waking up every morning to go and milk her cows and feed them with fodder that has high nutrient value. She is so keen and close with her cows, she has named one of them Teta. Milking Teta makes Evaline very proud, and she feels fulfilled.

Dairy farming being a very profitable business venture, Evaline wants to take full advantage. She would like to expand her dairy business, but the biggest challenge she faces is a lack of capital to grow with. She is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy a quality breed of dairy cow. Evaline has planted Napier grass, and feeding the cows will never be a challenge. She also owns an expansive piece of land, and the excess space will be productively used once she acquires the additional dairy cow. The exotic cow she will buy will produce between 10 and 15 litres of milk per day, and this will translate to more income and profits. The profits from milk selling will allow Evaline to grow her business further, by starting to package milk and by processing it into other dairy products, such as cream, yoghurt, and cheese. In addition, she will benefit from the organic manure from the cow. She projects that she will be able to start a biogas plant at her farm, which will save her money in fuel costs.

With your loan, all that Evaline dreams of is a secure future for her children. Evaline awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy an exotic, high-quality dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for grocery products for resale

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en: Alfred is 26 years old. He is studying business administration at the university. He is a young, determined, and focused individual. He wants the loan to pay for his studies, which he believes will have ended in 2017. With the inspiration of academia, the sky is the limit for him.

loans.use: to pay his tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for timber and metal bars

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses is a 37-year-old single man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in a motorcycle transport business and earns a monthly salary from the government. He faces the challenges of competition accompanied by little and delayed salary payment. However, he dreams of educating all his children to the university level. Moses needs a loan to buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transport business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy footwear, blankets, comforters, and clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grocery stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy TVs, radios, generators and solar panels.

loans.name: Peterson

texts.en: Greetings from Bulawayo, the second largest city in Zimbabwe. Peterson is a 50-year-old widower with three children, one of whom is attending school. He has been running a retail shop selling clothing and footwear for the last 17 years. His main challenge has been a lack of working capital, which has seen him unable to meet customer demands. Peterson has requested an $800 loan to buy clothing and footwear. The income realized as a result of this loan will be used to pay for household expenses. In the future, Peterson would like to operate more retail shops in town.

loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blankets, clothing, and footwear

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wood for several orders that represent valuable business opportunities

loans.name: Dumisani

texts.en: Greetings from Bulawayo, the second largest city in Zimbabwe. Dumisani is 42 years old and married with five children, three of whom are still attending school. Dumisani has, for the last 16 years, been running a retail shop selling blankets, clothing and footwear. He has two employees to assist him. His main challenge has been lack of working capital, which has limited growth of the company. Dumisani has request a $2,500 loan to buy blankets, clothing and footwear. The income generated as a result of this loan will be used to pay for household expenses. In the future, Dumisani would like to run a couple more retail shops.

loans.use: to buy blankets, clothing and footwear

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy motor spares and service kits

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is a married man, aged 58 years, with five children. He is a farmer who grows Irish potatoes and maize. He works for four days in a week and eight hours a day. He has also been an instructor in a Kamengo technical institute for 23 years, because it is his profession.

He hopes to use the loan to boost his agricultural business by buying cereals such as corn, beans and Irish potatoes. He usually sells his output to residents and fellow traders in the area. He faces a challenge of pests and diseases, plus too much drought, which affect his crops. 

He is described as an honest and hardworking man.

loans.use: to buy agricultural produce to sell at his store, especially sacks of beans and maize

loans.name: Above All Group

texts.en:
Esther is a very enterprising woman. She lives with her children in a community in Accra. She has been running a hair dressing salon for 11 years. 

Esther needs this loan to buy different hair products to serve her customers. With this loan, she expects an increase in sales due to having more fresh products to offer the customers that visit her salon. In a few years, Esther hopes that her business is positioned as the largest and most known in the area. She also hopes to be able to continue supporting her children so they become decent people in society and have better opportunities with their education.

Doris has been running clothing for 3 years. Diana's business has been a hair dressing service for 10 years.

loans.use: To buy wigs and other hair products to serve her customers better

loans.name: Martha Guiselle

texts.es:
La confianza en sí mismo, la actitud positiva y la perseverancia son los factores que han permitido a Martha salir adelante. Cada mañana, tras haber dejado todo organizado en su casa de habitación, sale a trabajar a su pequeña pulpería ubicada en el mercado central de su comunidad, ofrece los mejores productos y atención de calidad. Tiene 24 años, está casada y tiene un hijo de dos años. Inicio su negocio a los 19 años de edad, empezó con un pequeño capital que poco a poco lo ha ido multiplicando. Su esposo ha sido su mano derecha juntos quieren luchar por brindarle un futuro próspero a su hijo. 
Martha solicita el financiamiento para incrementar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar granos básico como arroz y frijoles; también aceite, condimentos, verduras, refrescos, golosinas, productos de aseo personal, entre otros. Ella deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que desea cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes, de manera que pueda generar más ingresos y así tener la oportunidad de mejorar las condiciones de su negocio, para que en un futuro sea una distribuidora de calidad. Su fuente de inspiración lo es su hijo, razón por la que no descansará hasta cumplir todas sus metas
texts.en:
Self confidence, a positive attitude, and determination are what have enabled Martha to succeed in life. Every morning, after leaving her home in tip-top shape, she leaves for work at her small grocery store, which is located in her community's central market. She offers the best products and pays great attention to their quality.

She is 24 years old, married, and has a 2-year-old son. She started her business when she was 19, beginning with a small investment that has grown little by little over the years. Her husband has been her right-hand man; together they want to fight for a better future for their son.

Martha is requesting the loan to grow her capital; she needs to buy basic grains (like rice), beans, oil, condiments, vegetables, soda, cookies, personal products, etc. She is relying on the loan to be able to meet the demand from her customers, so that she can make more income and be able to improve her business' conditions. She wants to be a quality distributor in the future.

Her inspiration comes from her son, so she will not tire until she fulfills all her goals.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains (like rice), beans, oil, condiments, vegetables, soda, cookies, personal products, etc.

loans.name: Abdi

texts.en: Mr. Abdi is 35 years old and lives in Hargeisa City. He is married, and has four children. He has three additional dependents that live in his house. In 2012, Abdi established his local food business. He began his business because he wanted to help his family. He works all the days of the week and 10 hours per day, and he earns around $400 every month from this business. Now Abdi needs a loan of 1500 USD to expand his business and he requested from Kaaba MFI. He hopes to enlarge his business as he has increasing demand. Kaaba will provide the loan to Abdi.

loans.use: to expand his local food business.

loans.name: Crusade Group

texts.en:
This group will begin its fourth cycle in ID-Ghana. It is made up of six members and is represented by Victoria, a member of the group. The businesses that the members of this group are in vary from soft drinks, grocery, lining, oil, gari (cassava flour), cassava, plantain, and noodle. 

Victoria says that she joined ID-Ghana a few years ago at the invitation of a friend who is a member of the institution. Her business is selling soft drinks. She reports that she started this business two years ago after observing that it was a good business. 

The loan that she will take out now is to increase capital by buying more soft drinks to sell to customers. She will acquire them from wholesale distributors in the city of Accra, and later she will sell them to customers. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support herself and dependants. When asked what she likes about ID-Ghana, she responds that she likes the help the institution gives to re-establish her business and for health insurance subsidy to its clients.

They will hold each other responsible for the repayment of the loan.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks and sell to customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials for her clothing manufacturing business

loans.name: Stella

texts.es:
Stella es una tradicional vendedora de arepas hecha al carbón, una profesión muy típica del departamento de Antioquia y muy solicitada pues los paisas (apodo asignado a las personas nacidas en Antioquia) siempre desayunan con arepa. 

Como se puede observar en la foto el negocio es muy humilde y sencillo cuenta con un pequeño asador, pero gracias a este ha logrado colaborar con los gastos familiares pro varios años. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de un asador a carbón más grande, una sombrilla para protegerse del sol, mesas y sillas para que sus clientes disfruten de una arepa con mantequilla que tiene un sabor delicioso. 

Sueña con poder ser la líder en venta de arepas y que su producto se venda en todas las tiendas del barrio.
texts.en:
Stella is a traditional vendor of charcoal-grilled arepas (corn pancakes). It is a profession very typical of the department of Antioquia, and very much in demand, as the “Paisas” (a nickname given to persons born in Antioquia) always breakfast on arepas. 

As can be seen from the photo, the business is very humble and simple, consisting of a small grill, but thanks to this, she has been able to contribute to the family’s household expenses for several years.

She is seeking a loan for the purchase of a bigger charcoal grill, an umbrella to protect herself from the sun, and tables and chairs, so that her customers may enjoy a delicious tasting arepa with butter.

She dreams of being the leader in sales of arepas, and that her product may be sold in all of the neighborhood stores.

loans.use: to purchase a charcoal grill, a large umbrella to protect herself from the sun, and tables and chairs, so that her customers may enjoy her products.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago es un joven sorprendente y digno de admirar pues a sus 18 años esta pensando en abrir su segunda sucursal de venta de helados y noe s pro que sus padres le ayuden económicamente, todo lo logro gracias a que en sus ratos libres los aprovecho trabajando y juntando ingresos para montar una heladería y ha sido tan exitosa que ahora quiere expandirse a otro barrio. 

Al ser joven y ante todo humilde no tiene grandes recursos y aunque de su bolsillo pago todo el equipo, neveras ahora carece de publicidad para impulsar su nuevo punto de venta. 

Solicita un crédito para realizar la publicidad de su nuevo punto de venta por lo que pide una ayuda que apoye el emprendimiento demostrando que un joven desde 0 puede lograr grandes cosas solo con determinación y trabajo.

Su sueño es que le apoyen el crédito y tener éxito con su nuevo punta de venta el cual comenzara a tener más empleados lo que lo motiva mucho pues está progresando a una corta edad
texts.en: Santiago is a remarkable young man to be admired because at his 18 years of age he is planning to open his second branch selling ice cream. His parents have not even supported him financially. He achieved this because in his free time he worked and earned the money to start an ice cream store, and he was so successful that he now wants to expand to another neighborhood. Because he is young and of humble origin, he does not have enough resources. Even though he paid the whole refrigeration equipment himself, he now lacks the funds to promote his business with advertisement. He is requesting a loan to advertise his new point of sale. He is requesting support for his enterprise which has shown that a young man can start with nothing and achieve great things solely with determination and work. His dream is to get the support for this loan and to be successful in his new point of sale, which will start having more employees. This motivates him a lot since he is progressing at such a young age.

loans.use: To promote his new outlet and show that one should take advantage of being young.

loans.name: Agostinho

texts.pt:
Tem 40 anos de idade, com nivel primario, vive maritalmente e é pai de 7 filhos 1 dos quais maior de idade, todos ainda na sua responsabilidade e a estudarem.
esta a tomar o credito pela primeira vez para investir na sua machamba que a pouco mais de 9 anos tem sido uma das suas fontes de renda, para alem do mini bus que faz transporte de passageiros.
com o credito pretende comprar insumos agricolas para produzir repolho.
ele tem o sono de poder cultivar mais areas e aumentar a sua producção.
seu maior desafio é o risco que entrenta na sua actividade que pode ser na produção ou a falta de preço dos produtos no mercado.
texts.en:
Agostinho is 40 years old and married. He completed elementary school. He has seven children, one of whom is an adult. All his children are still under his responsibility and attend school.
This is the first loan that he applies for, and it's for investing in his farm. For a little over nine years, his farm has been one of his sources of income aside from the passenger-carrying mini-bus.
With the loan he intends to purchase farm supplies in order to grow cabbage.
His dream is to cultivate more land and increase his production.
His biggest challenge is the risk he faces in his business, either in terms of production or the lack of pricing in products at the market.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies in order to grow cabbage.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bundles of used clothing in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for bodices, skirts and skin tights to sell.

loans.name: Finda

texts.en: This is forty-six year-old Finda.  She is married and has three children aged twenty-nine, twenty-seven and seventeen. In 2002, Finda established her garri and groundnut business. She began her business because she wanted to help in supporting her husband for a better welfare for their children. Her business is located in city center and her main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about Le 2,020,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Finda requires a loan in order to buy additional bags of garri and groundnuts. She hopes that this loan can increase stock and raise income. In the future, Finda plans to own a factory that will be producing garri and a large portion of farm to grow groundnut. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for bags of garri and groundnuts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for rolls of cotton and wooding materials

loans.name: Ibrahim H.

texts.en: This is 27-year-old Ibrahim.  He is single, and has one child, age six. He has four additional dependents that live with him because they are his brothers and sister to take care of after the death of their mother.  In 2012, Ibrahim established his cooking condiments (Maggi, couscous, mayonnaise, baked beans, luncheon meats and ketchup) business. He took over the business after the death of his mom, to take care of his younger siblings. His business is located in the city center and his main customers are all ages. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about SLL 1,082,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Ibrahim requires a loan in order to buy additional mayonnaise, foil bowls, and packet seasons. He hopes that this loan will increase his purchasing power, thereby letting him have more stock. In the future, Ibrahim plans to educate his younger ones and child to the highest level of education, and to be able to meet their daily needs. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase mayonnaise, foil bowls, and packet seasons.

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en: This is 44-year-old Fatu.  She is single and has two children ages 22 and 14. In 2002, Fatu established her ladies’ sandals and slippers business. As a single parent she prefers doing business to take care of her children and her daily needs. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are all ages. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,958,750 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Fatu requires a loan in order to buy additional sandals and slippers. She hopes that this loan will increase stock and raise income. In the future, Fatu plans to educate her children and create better resources for them. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for sandals and slippers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs such as cooking oil, flour, beans, sugar, garlic, onions, crackers, bread, tomatoes, candy, and popcorn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To get through this difficult period and invest in the customer management system.

loans.name: G.s Bella Vista Group

texts.es:
El señor Daniel es un hombre emprendedor y dedicado a su negocio propio que es venta y elaboración de bloques contando con 6 años de experiencia  tiene una  maquina manual para elaborar los bloques, se levanta muy temprano porque la elaboración de bloques con maquina manual lleva más trabajo.
Don Daniel  las ventas de los bloques las realiza en el municipio de Teupasenti y diferentes aldeas está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de cemento, arena, grava, etc. espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante en su negocio y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
Don Daniel uno de sus sueños es poder contar con una maquina industrial para hacer bloques y así facilitar el trabajo, el solicita el préstamo de forma grupal con las siguientes personas.
Doña Yansy se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos desde hace 2 años.
Doña Bilma se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos,  desde hace 4 años. 

Danlí, Honduras – Agosto  2014
texts.en:
Daniel is an enterprising man engaged in his own business which is making and selling blocks, counting on six years of experience.

He has a manual block making machine, he gets up very early because the making of blocks with a manual machine takes more work. He sells the blocks in the municipality of Teupasenti and various towns.

He requests the loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, etc. He hopes this investment will allow him to move forward with his business and to improve a little the quality of life for him and his family. One of Daniel's dreams is to have an industrial block making machine and thus facilitate the work. 

He is requesting this loan as part of a group with the following persons:
Yancy, who has worked for two years selling clothing and shoes.
Bilma, who has worked for four years selling clothing and shoes.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, etc., for his business.

loans.name: Mahamoud

texts.en:
Mahamoud is 56 years old and lives in Hargeisa City, Somaliland. He is married and has 12 children, two of whom are currently in school while the others study higher education. For the past two years, Mahamoud has been working hard to manage his market in the Sha’ab area of Hargeisa City, in which he built rooms for business purposes. Now he has finished 14 rooms and has a well-organized market, but there are still 10 rooms remaining to be built. He has rented all of the completed 14 rooms and now is working.

To help expand his market and to build the the remaining 10 rooms, Mahamoud has requested a loan of $1,500. The loan will be used to build the other rooms for the market and will help him to generate greater profits and increase his income. Furthermore, it will increase the number of jobs in his market as new businesses will be started up there. He hopes that in the future he will be able to make a large market. Now Mohamoud is on a waiting list and Kaaba will provide him the loan.

loans.use: to build more rooms for his market

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El señor Juan es una persona joven, que junto a su esposa poco a poco están formando su hogar, tienen dos pequeños hijos, no son casados pero viven en concubinato, con mucho esfuerzo llego a estudiar solo hasta el octavo curso del nivel primario, viven en su casa que fue herencia de su padre, ambos se dedican a la actividad de la agricultura y entre los productos que más cultiva están la papa, cebada y avena en parcelas de sus padres. Para generar algunos recursos extras el señor también se dedica a la construcción como albañil, él es una persona responsable y trabajadora, para mejorar su producción se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono de gallinaza, semilla de papa y diferentes agroquímicos para su producción, así podrá mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Juan is a young man, who, together with his wife, is slowly forming his household. They have two small children. They are not married but live in a common-law relationship. 

With a great deal of effort, Juan managed to study to the eighth grade of primary school. He and his wife live in a house he inherited from his father.  

Both are farmers whose major crops include potatoes, barley and oats, which they grow on his parents’ lots.  In order to generate additional resources, Juan also works in construction as a mason.

He is a responsible and hardworking person.  In order to increase production he found it necessary to apply for a loan to purchase agricultural supplies, such as chicken fertilizer, potato seed and different agrochemicals. Thus he will be able to increase production and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, such as chicken fertilizer, potato seed and different agrochemicals.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
pai de familia, com 8 filhos 2 dos quais já adultos, vive maritalmente e à base de negocio que faz numa barraca em sua casa. esta a tomar o credito pela primeira vez.
pretende comprar: açucar, arroz, peixe, amendoim, bolchas, refrescos, cerveja, para ampliar o seu negocio que faz em sua casa.
seu sonho é desenvolver mais o seu negocio e ganhar o mercado.
a concorrencia e o fraco andamento do negocio é k tem sido seu obstaculo.
texts.en:
Fernando is a family man. He has eight children, two of whom are already adults. He's married and his means of livelihood is the business he runs from a stall at his house. This is his first loan.
He intends to purchase sugar, rice, fish, peanuts, crackers, refreshments and beer, so he can expand the business he runs in his home.
His dream is to further develop his business and win over the market.
His obstacles have been the competition and the fact that business has been slow.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, fish, peanuts, crackers, refreshments and beer, so he can expand his business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feeds for her poultry business.

loans.name: Olga

texts.pt:
jovem de 33 anos de idade, solteira, ainda sem filhos e vivendo sozinha na casa propria. vive à base de negocio que faz numa barraca dentro do mercado e que é a sua fonte de renda, tem nivel médio e esta tomar o crédito pela primeira vez.
com o crédito pretende comprar produtos alimentares como: frangos, carne, pedaços, bebidas, etc, para ampliar o seu negocio.
seu sonho é desenvolver mais o seu negocio, concluir a construção de sua casa e poder fazer o nivel superior.
seu maior desafio é a falta de fundos que não lhe permite ter o seu estabelecimento bem preenchido.
texts.en:
Olga is a young woman who's 33 years old and single. She doesn't have children yet and she lives by herself in a house that she owns. She earns a living through the business she runs from a booth in the market which is her means of livelihood. This is her first loan.
With the loan she intends to purchase foodstuffs such as chicken, meat, beverages and other items, so she can expand her business.
Her dream is to further develop her business, finish building her house and get a higher education.
Her biggest challenge is the lack of funds which prevents her from having a well-stocked business.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs such as chicken, meat, beverages and other items, so she can expand her business.

loans.name: Yolanda Del Socorro

texts.es:
Yolanda, junto a su esposo ha podido formar una unidad familiar y productiva bastante fuerte, ya que no solo prima el amor si no también los deseos de salir adelante y progresar como familia.

Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos de levante, es una actividad aprendida de su esposo quien actualmente se dedica a esta actividad y ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos durante mucho tiempo.

Ella pide un auxilio económico para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños e irlos cuidando y criando para posteriormente venderlos.

Ella es una mujer soñadora y gran voluntad, tanto así que ya piensa en grande y desea tener una marranera con gran capacidad.

Tiene gran ilusión y expectativa con este proyecto y confía en el buen corazón de las personas para sacar adelante su negocio.
texts.en: Yolanda, together with her husband, has formed a strong and productive family unit in which not only love is the priority, but also the desire to progress and get ahead as a family. She works in the raising and selling of pigs. It's an activity that she learned from her husband who currently is employed in this activity and it has been the main source of income for a long time. She's requesting financial help to buy some piglets to take care of and subsequently sell. She's a strong-willed dreamer, so much so that she sets big goals and wants to have a high capacity pig farm. This project has filled her up with lots of hope and expectation and she trusts in the kindness of others to help keep her business going.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise and later sell so that she can get ahead with her children and husband.

loans.name: Bobbie

texts.en:
Bobbie’s dream was born when she was a little girl. Her mother ran a photo studio, where Bobbie watched as customers went through the beautifying process of hair and make-up in preparation for their photo shoot. It was here that Bobbie developed her love for makeup and cosmetology which, years later, would compel her to enroll in beauty school.

With more than 10 years in the business, Bobbie said her greatest challenge has been staying patient while building up a reliable client base. Now that she feels experienced enough, Bobbie feels ready to take her next big step and open up her own salon. Her salon will have a total of four booths, one for her, and then another three for rent, and space for a manicurist.

She will use her Kiva loan to pay her first month’s rent and deposit for her salon space, in addition to buying quality salon equipment, including stylist stations, hair dryers, shampoo and chairs.

Bobbie doesn’t mind keeping her dreams small and cozy to start. Her goal is to make women feel good “inside and out” by providing a customer service experience that builds up her clients' self-esteem. 

With the help of Kiva lenders, Bobbie will continue putting smiles on her customers' faces for decades to come.

loans.use: to pay her first month’s rent and deposit for her salon space, in addition to buying quality salon equipment, including stylist stations, hair dryers, shampoo and chairs.

loans.name: Henrry Mauricio

texts.es:
El señor Henrry es un mecánico de motos y carros muy experimentado. 

Ha adquirido muchas habilidades a través del trabajo empírico todos estos años. 

Adicional a su labor como mecánico también tiene una pequeña venta de repuestos automotrices en el cual ofrece distintos tipos de repuestos en diferentes marcas.

Es un negocio pequeño, humilde pero que intenta levantar con mucha dedicación y trabajo duro.


Es un hombre muy trabajador y honrado que conoce el significado que tienen los automóviles para sus dueños y es por esto que siempre trata de ofrecer un excelente servicio, de buena calidad y de una manera eficiente a pesar de las incomodidades y lo humilde de su negocio.


El solicita un préstamo para surtir su negocio con repuestos para automóviles y motos, de este modo podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes y podrá ofrecerles siempre productos de calidad.
texts.en:
Sr. Henrry is a very experienced motorcycle and car mechanic. He has acquired many skills through hands-on work over  the years. In addition to his work as a mechanic, he also has a small business selling automotive spare parts where he sells different kinds and brands of parts. 

His is a small, modest business that he is trying to expand through dedication and hard work.

He is a very hardworking, honest man who understands the value that automobiles have for their owners. Consequently he always tries to provide excellent, efficient, high quality service despite any inconvenience and the modesty of his business.

He is requesting a loan to stock his business with spare parts for cars and motorcycles. In this way he will have products available for his customers and will always be able to offer them high quality items.

loans.use: to purchase a supply of automotive spare parts to strengthen his business.

loans.name: Tintoulou Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZOENABO est responsable du groupe TINTOULOU. Mariée, elle est mère  de sept (07) enfants. Le plus âgé a 28 ans et le moins âgé a 2 ans 06 mois. Deux vont à l’école et elle a 04 personnes en charge.
Elle fait des beignets et des gâteaux depuis plus de 28 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages.
Mme veut s’acheter un (01) sac de farine de blé, un (01) bidon de 20 litres d’huile et un sac d’haricot.
Elle veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour s’occuper de ses besoins et ceux de ses enfants. Mme ambitionne agrandir son activité devenir quelqu’un et faire bénéficier ses enfants.
texts.en: Ms. Zoenabo is the manager of Tintoulou Group. She is married and mother of seven children; the oldest is 28 years old and the youngest is 2.5 years old.  Two of her children attend school and she has four dependents.  She has been making doughnuts and cakes for over 28 years. She buys her supplies in the villages. She wants to buy one bag of wheat flour, one 20-kg canister of oil, and one bag of beans. She wants to use her profits to take care of her and her children's needs.  Her goal is to grow her business, become someone, and to provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy one bag of wheat flour, one 20-kg canister of oil, and one bag of beans.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: La señora  Teodora  tiene 64 años de edad, es viuda y vive con su hijo el cual ya es mayor y trabaja por cuenta propia, tiene 4 cabezas de ganado vacuno lechero y se dedica a la elaboración de quesillo, cuando falleció su esposo tuvo que empezar a trabajar con más fuerza ya que se quedó sola, su hijo menor vive con ella pero no ayuda con los gastos, el motivo del presente crédito es para poder comprar alimento balanceado para su ganado vacuno lechero ya que sin este alimento escasea la producción de leche y esto afecta a sus ingresos, que con gran sacrificio está logrando.
texts.en:
Teodora, 64, is a widow.  She lives with her son, who is an adult and works on his own.  Her youngest son lives with her but doesn't help with the expenses.

She has four head of dairy cattle and makes "quesillo" [soft cheese].  She had to start working harder when her husband died because she was left alone. 

The goal of the current loan is to be able to buy balanced feed for her dairy cattle.  Milk production is scare without it, and this affects the income she's earning with great sacrifice.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her dairy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase dresses, skirts, trousers and t-shirts for resale

loans.name: Benkellema Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe BENKELEMA ont en moyenne 38ans,3enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à Lafiabougou l’un des quartiers de la ville de SAN/SEGOU (la quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente de condiments, de céréales, des légumes et du savon.
Après avoir remboursés correctement leurs prêts précédents, les femmes du groupe BENKELEMA sont à leur 2ème prêt solidaire.MAMOU,2èmefemme de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo ;  compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 30Kg de riz, 5Kg de farine de blé, 5Kg de maïs, 10Litres d’huile 5Kg d’oignon et 1 demi paquet de Cube Maggi. Elle s’approvisionne sur place chez les grossistes.Elle effectue ses ventes, à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes en espèce et souvent à crédit.
Elle envisage réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de11 000FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé, à la nourriture, à l’habillement, aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en: The women of Benkelema group have an average age of 38. They have an average of three children and all live in extended traditional families in Lafiabougou, one of the neighborhoods in the city of San/Segou, in the fourth administrative region of the republic of Mali. These women met through kinship ties and run businesses selling condiments, cereals, vegetables, and soap.  After having fully repaid their previous loans, they are now on their second group loan.  Mamou, the woman standing second from left to right in the photo, plans to use her loan to buy 30 kg of rice, 5 kg of wheat flour, 5 kg of corn, 10 liters of oil, 5 kg of onions, and one half-package of Maggi cubes.  She buys her supplies from wholesalers on site.  She sells to a clientele of women and men for cash  and often for credit.  She expects to earn an average monthly profit of 11,000 FCFA that will be used to pay for healthcare, food, clothing, and school fees.  The remainder will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy cereals and condiments.

loans.name: Divina

texts.en: Divina is 58 years old and lives in Corrales, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children who are still school age. For their income, Divina has been engaged in managing a hauling, coco lumber and wood dealing business for 10 years, and earns approximately PHP 20,000 each month doing this type of business activity. At present, she is also employed as a clerk of the court in one of the courts in this province. She has requested a loan to purchase additional stock of coco lumber and wood to sell. The remaining amount is for the repair and maintenance of their delivery truck. Divina has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Divina hopes to expand her coco lumber and wood dealing business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of coco lumber and wood to sell.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en:
Crisanta lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental.  She is married with 5 children all of whom are now adults. 

Crisanta earns a living from hog-fattening and rice production and has done so for 10 years.  She earns approximately PHP3,000.00 each month doing this type of business activity.  

She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing additional 2 piglets and commercial feed for her hog-fattening business. Crisanta has been a member of PMPC for almost 12 years. 

In the future, Crisanta hopes to expand her hog-fattening business.

loans.use: To be used for purchasing additional 2 piglets and commercial feed

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Agée de 45 ans Amélé est mariée et mère de deux(2) enfants  résidant à Adidogomé. Elle fait le commerce de pagne. Elle  s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et elle revend par  la vente ambulante. Amélé sollicite ce prêt  pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Amélé, aged 45, is a married mother of two children living in Adidogomé. She does commerce in ’pagnes’ (the colorful cloth of western Africa). She gets her supplies twice a month at the big market of Lomé, and she resells her goods by hawking. Amélé is requesting this loan to expand her inventory in order to make more profits.

loans.use: to purchase 6 lengths of ‘pagne’ cloth and 2 of damask

loans.name: El Progreso De La Amistad Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “El Progreso De La Amistad” está conformada por 05 socios responsables. Este es el caso de Ana de 43 años separada. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en las zonas urbanas y provincias. Hace más de 05 años que se viene desempeñándose a dicho rubro donde tiene muy buena acogida por sus clientes. En esta oportunidad solicitó el crédito para la compra de camisas, polos, pantalones y chorts. El deseo de Ana es contar con local propio para ofrecer distintas variedades de prendas de vestir. El grupo “El Progreso De La Amistad” agradece a Kiva por la ayuda brindada. Ana se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste casaca azul.
texts.en:
The communal bank "El Progreso De La Amistad" [Friendship's Progress] is made up of 5 responsible members.

One of them is Ana, a 43-year-old woman who is separated from her husband. She works selling clothing in urban and rural areas. For more than five years, she has been carrying out this line of work, and she has very good reviews from her customers.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy shirts, polos, pants, and shorts. She wants to establish her own store where she will offer a variety of clothing.

The group “El Progreso De La Amistad” thanks Kiva for the help it offers. Ana is seated, first from the left, wearing a blue coat.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, polos, pants, and shorts

loans.name: Ronald

texts.en:
Ronald is married with 1 child. He is 32 years old and lives in Barra, Tudela, Philippines.

To earn a living, Ronald has a poultry business. He has had this business for 1 year.  Each month, he earns approximately PHP 2000. 

Ronald has been a member of PMPC for 5 months.  Recently, he applied for a loan to purchase a motorcycle. This will help him in the easy transport of his chickens to his customers.

In the future, Ronald hopes to earn more to provide for his family's daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Nghiêm

texts.en:
Nghiêm works in agriculture, farming food.  She is 44 years old and she is married with 4 children.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province.  Nghiêm has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  

This is Nghiêm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build toilet and water tank.

In the future, Nghiêm hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and water tank

loans.name: Dorcas Group

texts.fr: Madame Nambula est présidente de l’association d’affaire Dorcas.  Agée de 60 ans, elle est mariée à un homme d’affaire et ensemble ils ont 5 enfants scolarisés. Elle débuta  le petit commerce en 1984 à partir de fonds reçu de son mari avant de rejoindre Hekima. Le crédit demandé va faciliter l’achat de 100 objets d’art. Elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise, rehabiliter sa maison  et payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants. Elle bénie  Hekima et le remercie.
texts.en: Ms. Nambula is the president of the Dorcas business group. She is 60 years old, married to a businessman, and together they have five children attending school.  She started her small business in 1984 from funds received from her husband before she joined Hekima.  The requested loan will help her buy 100 works of art. She wishes to grow her business, refurbish her house, and pay her children's school fees. She blesses and thanks Hekima.

loans.use: to buy 100 objects of art.

loans.name: Gladys Del Socorro

texts.es:
Gladys una mujer forjada con un gran carácter quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales para su fábrica de ladrillos, pues como todo negocio atraviesa por malos momento y es en estos momentos donde los líderes se tiene que hacer notar y ella dice presente. 

Acude a la corporación con el ánimo de que la apoyen con su empresa pues es una mujer soltera sin hijos que depende exclusivamente de esta fábrica para sobrevivir y no solo se compromete a pagar el crédito con puntualidad si no a levantar su fábrica y generar empleos que apoyen a personas pobres.
texts.en:
Gladys is a strong woman of great character who wants to request a loan to purchase materials to make bricks. As in any business, hard times come; it is in these moments that leaders are noticed, and she stands out as one of them.

She is turning to the lending agency with the knowledge that they will support her in her business. She is a single woman with no children and depends exclusively on brick production to make ends meet. She not only commits to paying back her loan on time, but also will establish her brick factory which will provide employment to low-income people.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make bricks

loans.name: Adzo

texts.fr: Agée de 40 ans Adzo est mariée et mère de deux(2) enfants résidant à Adidogomé. Elle fait l’achat et vente des produits cosmétiques et des bijoux. Elle  s'approvisionne 1 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et elle revend par la vente ambulante. Adzo sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Adzo, aged 40, is a married mother of two children living in Adidogomé. She trades in cosmetic products and jewelry. She gets her supplies once a month at the big market of Lomé, and she resells her goods by hawking. Adzo is requesting this loan to expand her inventory in order to make more profits.

loans.use: to purchase 10 dozen nail polish products and 4 dozen make-up products

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa lives in an Buicaren in the Viqueque District.  She has three children and  her husband is a farmer.  Most of her daily income comes from selling chickens.  Teresa started her business in 2011 with her own working capital of $250.00.  She also has animals and a garden.

She is now applying for a loan of $800.00.  With the loan that is offered from Tuba Rai Metin, she believes her efforts will be successful and will guarantee her future.  She is happy with this loan because it will improve her living condition in the future.

loans.use: To buy chickens

loans.name: Joana

texts.en:
A loan of $800.00 is offered to Joana to improve her business.  She has a business where many people come to buy from her every day.  She buys and sells timber.  She has been in this business since 2002. She feels so comfortable running her business since she earns money every day.

Running a business has made Joana independent because she can be responsible for herself and also helping her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy and sell timber

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est mariée et mère d’un  enfant à l’âge de 26 ans et réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend des bananes plantain frites. Elle  s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois au marché d’Adidogomé pour l’achat des bananes plantain et elle revend après transformation  par la vente ambulante. Akossiwa sollicite ce microcrédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Akossiwa is a married mother of a 26-year-old child and lives in Adidogomé. She sells fried plantains. She gets her supplies of plantains four times a month at the Adidogomé market, and she resells her resulting products by hawking. Akossiwa is requesting this loan to expand her inventory in order to make more profits.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of plantains

loans.name: Yornedys

texts.es:
Yornedys es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 3 años que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia.

Hace un tiempo montó su venta de huevos, para lo cual tiene cierta cantidad de gallinas que le permiten tener muy una actividad independiente. 
Con esta actividad intenta salir adelante con su hijo y darle una vida plena y estable.

Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar algunas gallinas para poder incrementar su capacidad de producción de huevos y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes por los huevos.

De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, además de que su negocio resurgirá y podrá salir adelante. 

Además, Yornedys espera que con mayores ingresos su hijo pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una mejor educación.
texts.en:
Yornedys is a single mother, the head of her family, made up of herself and her 3-year-old son. She has come through many difficult times in her life, but she has always had the strength to pull through and continue improving, with her family.

Some time ago, she began selling eggs, so she has a number of hens, which provides her with a way of making money independently. Through this work, she works to succeed in giving her son a full and stable life.

For this reason, she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy some hens, in order to increase her egg production capacity and respond to her customers' demand for eggs. If she is able to do this, her sales will increase considerably, her business will boom, and she will be successful.

In addition, Yornedys hopes that, with this increased income, her son will be able to have a better quality of life and access to a better education.

loans.use: to purchase laying hens

loans.name: Nang Panga Group

texts.fr:
Mme AWA est responsable du groupe NANG PANGA. Mariée, elle est mère de six (06) enfants. Le plus âgé a 22 ans et le moins âgé a 04 ans.  05 vont à l’école. Elle a sept (07) personnes en charge.
Elle fait du jardinage depuis 05 ans. Elle s’approvisionne en ville.
Mme veut s’acheter 10 sacs d’engrais pour le jardinage
Elle veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle ambitionne payer les oignons stocké puis revendre quand le prix sera à la hausse.
texts.en:
Ms. AWA is the official of the group NANG PANGA. She is a married mother of six children. The oldest is 22 years old, and the youngest is 4. Five go to school. She has seven persons to support. 

Ms. AWA has been gardening for five years. She gets her supplies in town. She wants to purchase 10 sacks of fertilizer for gardening. She wants to use her profits to provide education and food for her children. Her ambition is to pay for stocked onions and then resell them when the price is high.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sacks of fertilizer for gardening

loans.name: Tusimame Group

texts.fr: Madame Katambu est membre du groupe de crédit Tusimame. Mariée à Pasteur, elle est âgée de 61ans et mère de 9 enfants tous scolarisés. Commerçante des divers articles au marché central et quelque fois à domicile, elle demande un nouveau prêt pour acheter 5 douzaines de calicot, 2 sacs de haricot, 2 sacs de riz, 2 bidons d’huile et 1 sac de sucre. Son rêve est de devenir une grande dame d’affaire. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour ce coup de main apporté aux femmes à faible revenu.
texts.en: Ms. Katambu is a member of the loan group “Tusimame”. Married to pastor, she is 61 years old and the mother of nine children, all provided with education. A merchant of a variety of goods at the central market and sometime at her home, she is ask for a new loan to purchase 5 dozen “calicot”, 2 sacks of beans, 2 sacks of rice, 2 containers of oil, and a bag of sugar. Her dream is to become a major businesswoman. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima for the help provided to low-income women.

loans.use: to purchase 5 dozen “calicot”, 2 sacks of beans, 2 sacks of rice, 2 containers of oil, and a bag of sugar

loans.name: Elvin David

texts.es:
El señor  Elvin  es un hombre trabajador  y dedicado al negocio propio venta de abarrotería en general desde hace 9 años actividad que realiza desde su casa de habitación atendiendo su negocio todos los días.
Don Elvin sus clientes principales son de la zona donde el reside, su negocio está situado en un punto estratégico porque en el lugar donde él vive no hay muchas pulperías y esto es lo que genera que  venda en gran cantidad su producto, esta solicita el préstamo para compra pollo, arroz, café, azúcar, mantequilla, refrescos, pan, etc. con las ganancias que obtenga sueña con poder seguir sacando adelante a su familia y que sus hijos puedan seguir estudiando.
Don Elvin uno de sus sueños es ver que sus hijos terminan sus estudios.

Danlí, Honduras - Agosto  2014
texts.en:
Elvin is a hard-working man, dedicated to his self-owned grocery store. For nine years, he has run this business from his home, attending to it every day of the week.

His main customers are from the area where he lives. His business is situated at a strategic point because, in the area where he lives, there are not many grocery stores, meaning that he is able to make a lot of sales.

He is requesting a loan to purchase chicken, rice, coffee, sugar, butter, soda, bread, etc. With his earnings, he hopes to continue supporting his family and to enable his children to continue going to school. One of his dreams is that his children be able to finish their studies.

Danlí, Honduras - August  2014

loans.use: to purchase chicken, rice, coffee, sugar, butter, soda, bread, etc. for his business

loans.name: Hermogenes

texts.es: El señor Hermogenes, es una persona humilde, mayor de edad, de estado civil casado, por diversas razones de la vida solo llego a estudiar  hasta el nivel primario, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa, ambos se dedican a la agricultura, su casa es de construcción rustica ubicada en la provincia Tiraque. Tiene un nieto que vive con ellos, al cual mantienen. La principal actividad económica a la que se dedica es la producción agrícola, los productos que más cultiva son papa, oca y haba en vaina verde en sus propias parcelas. Hermogenes es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora al igual que su esposa. Para ampliar y mejorar su producción se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un credito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono y semilla de papa, para así aumentar sus ingresos económicos que vayan a mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Hermogenes is a humble, older man, and he is married. For various reasons, he only studied until elementary school. He lives in his own house along with his wife; both of them work in farming. His house is rustic, and is located in the Tiraque province. They also support their grandson, who lives with them.

His main source of income is farming. The products he most commonly grows are potato, oca [a type of tuber], and fava bean.

Hermogenes is a very responsible and hard-working person, just like his wife. To expand and improve his production, he needs to request a loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizer and potato seed, so that he can increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies like fertilizer and potato seed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: G.s Bendicion De Jehova Group

texts.es:
La señora María Magdalena es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada a sus negocios, venta de ropa nueva y venta de tortillas estas actividades las realiza desde hace 7 años, sus actividades las  realiza de manera domiciliar, ambulante atiende personalmente a sus clientes todos los días de la semana.
Doña María Magdalena sus principales clientes son las personas que viven en su misma comunidad y comunidades vecinas, su negocio le ayuda de gran manera, ya que las ganancias le sirven para cubrir sus gastos personales y de igual manera le ha ayudado a mejorar su nivel de vida familiar, está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de pantalones, camisas, maíz y leña.
Doña María Magdalena solicita el préstamo de manera grupal con las siguientes personas.
Don Ronnie se dedica al comercio, su fuente de ingresos proviene de su negocio que es un taller industrial donde realiza trabajos  de soldadura actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años.
Doña Maritza se dedica a la venta de abarrotería, actividad que realiza desde hace 2 años.
 
Danlí, Honduras – Agosto   2014
texts.en:
María Magdalena is a hard-working woman dedicated to her businesses. For 7 years she has been selling new clothing and tortillas. She sells door to door, personally attending to her customers every day of the week. María Magdalena's customers are primarily people who live in her community and neighboring communities. Her business helps her greatly, as she uses the earnings to pay her personal expenses while helping to improve her quality of life.

She is seeking a loan to buy pants, shirts, corn and firewood. María Magdalena seeks the loan as part of a group of the following people. Ronnie has been welding for 3 years. Maritza has been selling groceries for 2 years. Danlí, Honduras - August 2014.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, corn and firewood for his businesses.

loans.name: René

texts.es:
Sololá se caracteriza ser una ciudad bien poblada con casas muy bien estructuradas y modernas,  construidas con materiales muy sofisticada. El desarrollo socioeconómico ha sido un factor principal pero también la mano de obra por albañiles y constructores calificados como es el caso de René albañil de 30 años de edad con una familia de 3 hijos los cueles son buenos estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad.

La actividad que el realiza es la albañilería el lleva realizando dicha actividad durante 12 años y se a convertido en una muy buena fuente de ingresos par el y su familia  el es muy dedicado a su trabajo el lo realiza de la forma más correcta y rápida.

El crédito que ha solicitado lo quiere utilizar para la compra de herramientas de albañilería para poder trabajar y realizar su trabajo con más rapidez y bien hecho, uno de sus sueños mientras corre el tiempo es convertirse en un maestro de obras y enseñarles a sus hijos el mismo oficio.
texts.en:
Sololá is notable for being a city full of very well-constructed and modern houses, made of sophisticated materials. Its socioeconomic development has been a factor in this, along with the work of skilled construction workers, such as René. He is 30 years old and has a family of three children, who are good students in their community's school.

René works in construction for a living, which he has done for the past 12 years. It has become a very good source of income for him and his family. He is very dedicated to his work, and he does it as quickly and as well as possible.

He wants to use his requested loan to purchase construction tools, so that he can complete his work more quickly and ensure its quality. One of his dreams over the years has been to become a master worker and teach his sons the same occupation.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools

loans.name: Dora Elena

texts.es:
La venta de frutas y verduras, es la actividad en la cual se desempeña Dora, una mujer con empuje y perseverancia para sacar adelante su propio negocio.

Ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años trabajando desde muy temprano en la mañana todos los días.

Ella decidió iniciar este proyecto al ver la necesidad de obtener más ingresos para su familia y ya que no tenía la educación suficiente para otro cargo, opto por la venta de frutas y verduras.

Es una mujer simpática y servicial, siempre dispuesta a atender las inquietudes y deseos de sus clientes.

Ella pide un auxilio económico para comprar un congelador para guardar sus productos, hacerle mantenimientos a su puesto de trabajo y comprar surtido de frutas y verduras para abastecer su pequeño negocio. 

Su sueño es tener una casa propia y darle a sus hijos un vida plena.
texts.en:
The sale of fruits and vegetables is the work that Dora performs. She is a woman with verve and perseverance to advance her own business.

She has been working in this business for more than 10 years, working from very early in the morning every day.

She decided to begin this project on seeing the need to obtain more income for her family, and since she didn't have the education sufficient for other work, she opted to sell fruits and vegetables.

She is a kind and helpful woman, always ready to tend to the concerns and desires of her customers.

She is requesting economic help to buy a refrigerator to store her products, to do maintenance on her sales stand, and to buy stock of fruits and vegetables to stock her little business.

Her dream is to have a house of her own and to give her children a full life

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, make improvements in her sales stand, and buy fruits and vegetables to stock her business and make it more prosperous

loans.name: Cesar

texts.en:
Cesar has the “Midas Touch” when it comes to sales. He was such a prolific salesman at his former employer, a major Mexican snack manufacturer, that his managers suggested he go into business on his own.
