With his connections in the industry, Cesar was able to quickly build up a client base that not only demands his products and is loyal to him, but that displays his products prominently near the cash register.

For Cesar, the problem since he started the business hasn’t been the demand, but the supply. With a limited amount of funds available to start his business, Cesar needs credit to buy more inventory and pay the down payment on a used van he will use to distribute product to local retailers. Proceeds from his Kiva loan will go toward those two ends.

In the future, Cesar hopes to keep plugging along, selling more product and growing slowly. As a recent start-up, his fixed costs, such as purchasing inventory and securing the van, are relatively large compared to his current level of sales, but Cesar says that as his business grows, those costs will fade into irrelevance. What will remain will be the smiling faces of Cesar’s customers, ever satisfied with his level of care and commitment to his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory and pay the down payment on his van.

loans.name: Sanjdemberel

texts.en:
Mr. Sanjdemberel, 33 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife is pregnant and stays at home. They live in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been making and selling furniture to local people since 2003. 

Sanjdemberel is requesting a loan of 3200000 MNT to buy planks in order to repair fences surrounding his home. This will result in increased protection against intruders, as his wife is alone until he comes home from work.

loans.use: to buy planks in order to repair fences at home

loans.name: Scarlette Yaoska

texts.es: La señora Scarlette es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, de la comarca conocida Buenos Aires, ella es casa su esposo es propietario de una Moto taxi que el mismo maneja, tiene un hijo pequeños, ella labora para una clínica dental privada como asistente, su mayor meta es terminar de construir su casa pero le falta, el crédito que ella solicito es para la compra de Ventanas, Puertas, Cemento, Cerámica ya que solo esos detalles le faltan, Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado con este primer crédito y espera seguir trabajando con nosotros para seguir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Scarlette lives in Ticuantepe in Buenos Aires. She is married and her husband owns a mototaxi that he drives. They have a small child. She works as an assistant in a private dental clinic. Her primary goal is to finish building their home but the need more money to do so. She seeks a loan to buy windows, doors, cement, ceramic tiles as these are the only details they still need. She is grateful for Kiva and Afodenic support through this first loan and she hopes to continue working with the organizations to continue improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy windows, doors, cement, and ceramic tiles.

loans.name: Aldrin

texts.en:
Aldrin, a married man who lives in Alcala with his wife and children, manages a rice field where he plants and harvests rice to sell. He goes down to tend his crops field daily to ensure good growth. 

Aldrin is requesting a loan of P10,000 to buy herbicides, insecticides and fertilizers for his field to help ensure a good harvest. Someday, he hopes to gain enough to sustain both his business and his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, insecticides and fertilizers to use in farming

loans.name: Deyby De Jesus

texts.es:
Deiby un agricultor de 31 años de edad dedicado al campo y ala porcicultura, razón pro la que viene a interactuar a solicitar un crédito y es que con el campo no ha tenido mucho éxito, los insumos son muy costosos y se vende a muy bajo costo y en ocasiones la ganancia es 0, incluso hay perdidas. 

Deiby consciente de la situación quiere potencia su venta de cerdos y por ello solicita un crédito para invertir en la compra de cerdos de cría y de engorde esperando mejorar su situación y futurizando su vida con tierras propias pues alquila terrenos para cultivar. 

Es padre de un hijo de 8 años vive solo con él y sabe que el futuro de este niño está en sus manos y tiene que multiplicarse si quiere brindarle todas las herramientas para salir adelante y bien sabe que a una persona el campo le queda muy difícil pues su trabajo no es bien valorado

Su gran sueño y anhelo es tener sus propias tierras.
texts.en:
Deiby is a 31-year-old farmer, who works in the pork industry and as a farmer. He is requesting a loan because he has not had much success in farming; fertilizer is very expensive and sales do not bring in much money. Sometimes his profit is zero, or even a net loss.

Conscious of this situation, Deiby wants to strengthen his pork sales, and for this reason, he is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of hogs to raise and fatten. He hopes to improve his situation and stabilize his future by buying his own land, since he currently rents land to cultivate.

He is the father of an 8-year-old son who lives with him, and he knows that the future of this child is in his hands. He must multitask if he wants to provide him with the tools to succeed, and he well knows that it is difficult for a country person since his work is not highly valued.

His biggest dream and desire is to own his own land.

loans.use: to buy hogs to raise and fatten

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita lives in Dalaoig with her family. She is 43 years old and has three children. Juanita and her husband rely on income from the farming business they manage. They plant and harvest rice to sell to traders. 

Juanita pays labourers to help them in their farming activities. She is now asking for additional capital of 10,000 Philippine pesos to buy pesticides and insecticides and pay labour costs for farming. 

Juanita and her husband want to maintain a good harvest so they will gain enough income to save for their family's future expenses.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and insecticides and pay labour costs for farming

loans.name: Julian

texts.es: El señor Julián es una persona responsable y trabajadora, tiene dos hijos pequeños que asisten a la escuela para tener una mejor educación, ya que el no tuvo esa oportunidad y solo llego a cursar el nivel primario. Julián vive junto a su esposa, sus hijos y su padre en una casa ubicada en Tiraque, la cual está construida de forma rustica. Se dedica a la actividad agrícola, entre los productos que más siembra durante el año son la papa, cebolla, haba en vaina verde y cebada. El señor trabaja por sus hijos para darles una mejor educación y mejor condiciones de vida por lo cual está solicitando un crédito para comprar abono organico y semilla de papa de esta manera generara mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Julián is a responsible and hard-working person. He has two small children who attend school to receive a better education; he did not have this opportunity and only completed elementary school. Julián lives with his wife, his children, and his father in a rustic house in Tiraque.

He works in agriculture for a living. Among the most commonly grown products are potatoes, onions, fava beans, and barley. He works in order to provide his children a better education and better quality of life.

He is requesting a loan to purchase compost and potato seed so that he can generate a higher income.

loans.use: to purchase compost and potato seed

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson, 37, is married and has two children. A farmer, he plants and harvests rice to sell. 

He has wanted to increase his crop production but has had insufficient funds, which is why he is asking for an additional loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos to use in the rice field. 

He will buy farm inputs (fertilizers and insecticides) and pay labour costs for farming. These investments will help him to improve his crop output, leading to a bountiful harvest some day. He will save his revenue for education purposes.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs (fertilizers and insecticides) and pay labour costs for farming

loans.name: Jolibert

texts.en:
Jolibert, 38, is married and lives in Alcala with his family. A farmer, he plants and harvests rice to sell. 

He patiently manages a farming business to gain income to sustain his family's needs and pay for the education of his children. He would like to increase his crop production but has had insufficient funds. This is why he is now asking for a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming. 

This loan will help him achieve good crop growth and some day increase his crop production.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming

loans.name: Famita

texts.en: Famita makes a living through food vending. She is from Siquijor, 45 years old and married. She signed up for her membership with Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative to access financial assistance. She availed herself of a loan to purchase additional ingredients like flour, sugar and milk. Famita hopes to double her income though increasing her food production. In the future Famita hopes to see all her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like flour, sugar and milk.

loans.name: Erdenedalai

texts.en:
Mrs. Erdenedalai is 33 years old and lives with her husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been selling clothes since 2006. Her husband works at a mining site as a heavy truck driver. She is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to buy a heavy truck in order to rent it out to her husband's colleague for extra income. Her husband's colleague is a very reliable person whose former truck became outdated and he has no cash to buy a new one.

In the profile picture you can see the borrower and her husband in front of the truck they expect to buy.

loans.use: to buy a heavy truck in order to rent it out.

loans.name: Abel De Jesús

texts.es: El señor Abel de Jesús tiene cosechado actualmente dos y media manzana de Piña las cuales requieren de mantenimiento para poder así eliminar toda clase de plaga o evitar también la quema por mucho Sol, con el crédito que solicita comprara: 20 quintales de Completo, 3 galones de Gesapax, 6 litros de Byfolan, 2 litros de Cipermetrina y 10 galones de Triple. todo esto para garantizar una cosecha en buen estado y de calidad, el señor Abel agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado.
texts.en:
Abel de Jesús is currently growing 2.5 manzanas of pineapple, which require care to be able to get rid of all types of pests and to avoid burning from the sun.

With the loan he's requesting he's going to buy 20 quintals of Completo, 3 gallons of Gesapax, 6 liters of Byfolan, 2 liters of Cipermetrina, and 10 gallons of Triple.  All this will guarantee a quality harvest in good condition.

Abel's grateful for the support Kiva and AFODENIC have provided for him.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en: Tessie lives in her house at Tuguegarao City. She is 57 years old, married and has four children. She runs a housing rental business for income. She has been in the business for three years. Her income goes towards monthly electric and water bills. The other part of her income is used for the maintenance of her business. She hopes to provide more comfortable rooms for rent - that is why she is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy wood and pay for maintenance of the house. Someday she hopes to construct more concrete houses for rent.

loans.use: to buy wood and pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Blanca Elizabeth

texts.es: Blanca tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 16 años, 13 años y 7 años de edad. Ella es la única que aporta para mantener la economía del hogar dado que no habita con su compañero de vida. Ella se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos en una hacienda cercana a su localidad y además por medio de su taller de costura que con mucho esfuerzo y con la ayuda que ha recibido de FUSAI ha logrado mantener y seguir brindando sus servicios. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir nuevamente en su negocio de costura dado que es su principal fuente de ingresos. En esta ocasión invertirá en la compra de telas para forros de muebles y para la compra de maquina industrial que le facilite la elaboración de los productos. Expresa estar muy agradecida con FUSAI por el apoyo prestado.
texts.en: Blanca is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her three children, ages 16, 13, and 7. She is the only one who contributes to maintaining the household economy, given that she doesn't live with her life companion. She earns her living by offering domestic services at an estate near her location and in addition through her sewing workshop, which she has managed to maintain with great effort and with the help that she has received from FUSAI and to continue offering her services. She has decided to invest in her sewing business again, given that it is her principal source of income. At this time, she will invest in the purchase of fabrics to cover furniture and in the purchase of an industrial machine which will facilitate the construction of her products. She states that she is very grateful to FUSAI for the support they have lent.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fabrics to cover furniture and to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 34 years old and shares her life with her partner and three children. For the past eight years she has earned a living by raising and selling pigs. She also earns additional income from farming rice.

Marivic is borrowing 7000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can eventually afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Adama, thirty years old, is single and has one child. In 2008 she opened a beauty salon because she wanted to live a responsible life and help educate other less privileged girls.

Adama’s salon is located in the city’s center and her main customers are adults. Working twelve hours a day, six days a week, she earns about 1,724,000 SLL every month.

Adama has already received and successfully repaid one loan through ARD. She is now applying for a 5,000,000 SLL loan to buy additional hair products including hair weaves and different types of hair decorations. She hopes that this loan will increase her stock, result in more business and so generate more income.

In the future Adama plans to open a hairdressing academy. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy additional hair products including hair weaves and different types of hair decorations.

loans.name: Agustinha

texts.en: Agustinha lives in Buicaren and most of her daily income is earned from selling cows. She is applying for a loan of $1.500.00. Agustinha started her business in 2010 using her own working capital of $500.00.  Along with her ​​husband, her plan was to add money to the original amount to buy another cow and improve their business. She is happy with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin that will be used to buy more cows.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Jose De Jesus

texts.es:
José es un campesino humilde y trabajador de 69 años de edad, que desde pequeño aprendió todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre.

Actualmente posee un cultivo de café, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas y vendidas en el mercado del pueblo donde reside, esto le genera los recursos para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar y solventar las necesidades básicas de su esposa y 6 hijos.

Se motiva a solicitar el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes), esto le permitirá seguir cuidado de sus cultivos y mejorar la productividad de la próxima cosecha, lo que beneficiará los ingresos que percibe por cada venta.

José manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir luchando para generar una estabilidad económica y brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
José is a humble and hard-working farmer, 69 years old. He learned all the agricultural tasks when he was young, thanks to the teachings of his father.

Now he has a coffee planting, whose harvests are collected and sold in the market of the town where he lives. This generates the resources for him to bring daily sustenance to his household and to pay for the basic necessities of his wife and six children.

He was motivated to apply for the loan with the goal of investing it in the purchase of agricultural supplies wholesale (compost, pesticides, and fertilizers). This will allow him to continue caring for his plantings and improve the productivity of the next harvest, which will benefit the income that he earns for each sale.

José states that his greatest desire is to continue working to generate a stable economy and to offer his family better living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as compost, irrigation, and coffee seeds to advance his crop.

loans.name: Jusemen

texts.en: Juseman is a 29-year-old hardworking mother.  She is a microfinance member of the Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and is thankful for the capital  extended to her. Recently, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities. Jusemen hopes to increase her sales by increasing her inventory.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуда  добрая женщина в возрасте 42 лет. Она замужем и имеет сына и 2 дочери. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. Мавлуда живет со своей семьей, и мечтают воспитывать своих детей хорошими людьми. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Мавлуда  занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении семи лет она занимается купля продажей детской и мужской одежды. Это очень необходимые вещи. Раньше она продавала только мелкими вещами, со временем она перешла на более крупные вещи и добавила в ассортимент мужские одежды. Она привозит сама товар с Истаравшана, которые закупает  на большом оптовом рынке  для продажи. А также покупает на оптовом местном рынке  и продаёт их в своём городе. Этот бизнес приносит ей постоянный хороший доход. И сейчас Мавлуда  хочет расширить свой бизнес, увеличить свой ассортимент товар разнообразные детские и мужские . Поэтому она хочет взять кредит для закупа большого ассортимента товара. Для получения кредита она обратился в Арванд и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Mavluda is a kind and very hardworking 42-year-old woman.  She is married and the mother of one son and two daughters.   She lives with her family and hopes to raise her children well so that they become good people.  

In order to provide for her family, Mavluda runs her own business.  For the past seven years, she's been buying and selling first-necessity children's and men's clothes.  In the past, she only used to sell small items.  Over time, she also started to sell larger items and eventually added men's clothes to her inventory.  She buys her merchandise at a wholesale market and brings it herself from Istarvshan for resale.  She also buys clothes at a local wholesale market and resells in her own town.  Thanks to her business, she makes a decent and stable income.  

Mavluda now wants to expand her business and increase her assortment of various children's and men's clothes.  For this reason, she is taking a loan which will help her to buy more merchandise.  She has turned to Arvand to get this loan, and she is looking forward to a positive outcome!

loans.use: to buy clothes for the fall season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for his business of selling ceviche.

loans.name: Terencia

texts.en:
Terencia is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Terencia is 51 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Terencia has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 16000 PHP loan  through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Terencia has been in this business for 6 years and would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Mujeres Empresarias Group

texts.es: El grupo “MUJERES EMPRESARIAS” está conformada por mujeres trabajadoras y responsables en sus cuotas de grupo. Elvira tiene 26 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos independientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza a través de catálogos. Y a la vez brinda servicios de de cuidado de niños. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza que estén en oferta joyas perfumes colonias para expenderlos a un precio que le genere buenas ganancias. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Elvira es la primera del lado derecho.
texts.en: The communal bank "Mujeres Empresarias” (Entrepreneurial Women) is made up of hard-working women who act responsibly with regard to their communal bank fees.  Elvira is 26-years old.  She is married and has two dependent children.  She makes her living selling beauty products through catalog orders.  Additionally, she offers childcare services.  Elvia will invest the loan in the purchase of discounted beauty products, jewelry, perfume and cologne to re-sell at a price that will generate a good profit.  The members of the communal bank are grateful to the KIVA investors for the loan they have provided.  In the above photo, Elvira is the first one on the right.

loans.use: with the purchase of beauty products.

loans.name: Elmalyn

texts.en:
Elmalyn, 33, is married and has three children who are currently in school. For the past twenty years she has worked hard catching and selling fish in the Philippines.

Elmalyn has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional supplies and gear for her business. She hopes to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing supplies and gear

loans.name: Camino Al Exito Group

texts.es: “CAMINO AL ÉXITO” es un grupo conformado por socias dedicadas al comercio minoristas. Luz tiene 37 años de edad es casada con 02 hijos independientes. Ella trabaja en su librería que implemento en su vivienda. De esa manera puede apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la educación de sus hijos. Años atrás se dedicaba a su hogar y a estudiar. En sus tiempos libres trabaja en un restaurant con ayudante de cocina. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mas útiles escolares cuadernos lapiceros colores laminas papelotes. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Luz es la segunda del lado izquierdo.
texts.en: The “CAMINO AL ÉXITO” group consists of  members with small businesses. Luz is 37 years old. She is married with two independent children. She works in her bookstore located in her home. She can help her husband with her children's educational expenses. In the past she was dedicated to her home and studying. In her free time, she works at a resturant, helping in the kitchen. The loan will be invested in the purchase of more school supplies like notebooks, colored pencils, etc. The group is grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan. Luz is the second from the left in the photo.

loans.use: purchase more school supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for labor, fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma has a pig business in Lazi, Siquijor. At the age of 30 and married, she exerts more effort to make good sales. She feels that Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative has made her a better businesswoman, as she is cautious in managing her business. With good returns, she is able to renovate their house with concrete walls. Recently, Emma accessed a loan to purchase animal vitamins and feed.  She hopes to double her income especially now with the high demand of pigs.

loans.use: to purchase animal vitamins and feed.

loans.name: Leda

texts.en:
Leda is 34 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family, by running a general store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items, such as canned goods, soft drinks, candies, biscuits, and noodles.

Leda has borrowed and repaid ten loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years while earning additional income raising pigs. Leda aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft-drinks, candies, biscuits, and noodles.

loans.name: Hermogina

texts.en:
Hermogina is 52 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming coconuts in the Philippines. Hermogina is borrowing PHP 6000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Hermogina has been farming coconuts for 20 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Eric

texts.en: Eric is 18 years old, single and a first-year college student studying Secondary Education. His mother relies on income from a junk shop business while his father is a laborer. His parents' income is not enough for all their expenses.  For this reason, he requests an educational loan of PHP 7,000 to pay tuition and daily school allowances. This will help him continue his education and achieve his dream of becoming a teacher someday.

loans.use: to pay tuition and daily school allowances.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, and pesticides to apply to his crops.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La señora Martha vive en el municipio de Masaya junto a su esposo desde hace mas de 30 años, el labora para una institución del gobierno y ella se dedica a la actividad comercial, es dueña de una cafetería que esta ubicada en su vivienda donde elabora los desayunos y los va a distribuir a sus clientes que están ubicados en la Alcaldía del municipio, Mercado Artesal, etc. ella solicita este crédito para la compra de una cocina Industrial, una Refrigeradora de segunda y Provisiones como Pan, Carnes, Crema, Queso, Arroz, Aceite, todo lo que necesita para elaborar las diferentes comidas que vende, Agradece la confianza que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado con este Financiamiento.
texts.en:
Martha lives in the town of Masaya with her husband of more than 30 years, he works for a government institution and she is in business, she owns a cafe which is located in her home where she makes breakfasts and distributes them to her customers who are located in the town hall, craft market, etc.

She is requesting this loan to buy an industrial stove, a secondhand refrigerator and groceries such as bread, meat, cream, cheese, rice, oil, everything she needs to make the meals she sells. 

She thanks Kiva and AFODENIC for believing in her with this loan.

loans.use: to buy groceries and an industrial stove.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora is skilled in making snacks. She sells snacks at the market, school canteens, and during weekly center meetings. She grabs every opportunity to sell and earn a living. She is thankful to Paglaum Multi Purpose for the financial help extended to her. She was able to increase her production. Recently, she availed a loan to purchase raw ingredients. Someday, Flora hopes to save to renovate their house for comfortable living.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients.

loans.name: Marichu

texts.en: Determination and hard work pushes Marichu to start a business. She gathered up her courage to manage her pig business. She has taken measures to access a loan and has landed membership to Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for her capital needs. She availed a loan to buy feed and vitamins. Her next project is to have concrete pig pens to maintain sanitation.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Papia

texts.en:
Papia is 69 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by farming coconut in the Philippines. Papia is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and other farm supplies.

Papia has been farming coconut for 19 years, while earning additional income from food vending. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Niza

texts.en:
Niza is 49 years old and married with three children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Niza is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Niza has been farming rice for 13 years and she also earns additional income from buying and selling nipa roofing. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Concordia

texts.en:
Concordia is 49 years old and married with seven children.

She earns a living by farming coconuts in the Philippines. Concordia is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Concordia has been farming coconuts for 25 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарина 35 летняя жительница не большого района Яван. Она замужем. Ее муж, как и большинство мужчин республики, находиться в Российской Федерации. У Зарины пока нету детей. Она живет вместе с мамой, братом и сестренкой. Зарина в течение трех лет предоставляет услуги портнихи. Шить и кроить ее научила мама. До сих пор она советует дочери в ее работе. Зарина благодарна маме, потому что доход от ее услуг приносит в дом значительную пользу. На данный момент она работает на этой машинке, которую Вы видите на фотографии. Машинка сильно устарела и Зарина хочет приобрести новую, но не имеет финансовую возможность совершить покупку. Она просит кредит с надеждой на то, что ей помогут, и она сохранить источник дохода.
texts.en: Zarina is 35 years old and lives in the small region of Yavan. She is married. Her husband, as most men in Tajikistan, works in the Russian Federation. Zarina does not have children yet. She lives together with her mother, brother and sister. For three years, Zarina has been working as a seamstress. It was her mother who taught her to sew and cut. Her mother still advises Zarina in her work. Zarina is grateful to her mother because the income  from this work is beneficial for the household. At present Zarina uses the sewing machine you see in the photo. The sewing machine has become really obsolete, and Zarina would like to buy a new one but lacks the financial resources needed. She is applying for a loan in the hope of getting help and maintaining her source of income.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine in order to speed up her work process.

loans.name: Severina

texts.en:
Severina is a widowed mother of five children. She is managing almost four hectares of rice fields. In order to grow her crops well, Severina hires laborers to cultivate her field. Sometimes, she’s not able to pay her laborers on time because of financial constraints.

Severina wishes to have PHP 20,000 to pay her laborers on time. She will also use the loan to buy fertilizers for her crop. Severina hopes to retain her laborers, working and managing her farm well.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en:
Oliver is 44 years old, married and blessed with three children. He has been engaged in a farming business for 20 years. Oliver and his partner in life, Delia, both help each other to sustain their business so that they can meet all the needs of their children. Oliver is a very funny person. He loves to talk with their clients and he is a very accommodating person which is why many of his clients want him. 

In the future Oliver hopes that his business expands so that he can improve the quality living for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, manure and farm materials.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is 46 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 6 children of adult and school age. 

For the past 4 years Elma has been engaged in managing a Sari-sari Store that sells groceries and other consumable products for a living, She earns approximately 6,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stocks of groceries and other consumable goods for retail.

Elma has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Elma hopes to expand her sari-sari store and to engage in the coco and good lumber dealing business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries and other consumable goods.

loans.name: Martin Rodriguez

texts.es: Martín tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos. Martín tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio de venta de mariscos y de productos de belleza por catalogo. Esta actividad es la que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Martín solicitó un préstamo en el pasado para invertir en su negocio y poder así mejorar sus ventas e ingresos. Gracias al apoyo que recibió de FUSAI ahora cuenta  con un negocio un poco más abastecido pero ahora la demanda ha aumentado por lo que solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mariscos y un refrigerador para el mantenimiento de los mismos. Además, desea comprar mayor cantidad de productos de belleza por catalogo. De esta forma espera hacer crecer su negocio y dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Martin is 45 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and four children. Martin has been in business for quite some time, selling seafood and beauty products from catalogs. This work is what allows him to sustain his household and give his family better living conditions. 

Martin previously requested a loan to invest in his business and be able to improve his sales and income. Thanks to the support he received from FUSAI, his business is currently a bit better stocked but now the demand has increased so he is requesting a new loan from FUSAI to invest in buying seafood and a refrigerator to keep them fresh. Also, he wants to buy a greater quantity of beauty products by catalog. This way, he hopes to make his business grown and give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seafood, a refrigerator and beauty products by catalog.

loans.name: Crecer Group

texts.es: Doris de 33 años de edad es casada con 02 hijos dependientes. Ella forma parte del grupo “Crecer” y está constituido por 05 socias emprendedoras. Doris se dedican a la crianza de gallinas ponedoras. A su vez como actividad secundaria distribuye productos de belleza. Tiene planeado mejorar su granja en su propio local. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de jaulas, mallas y bandejas para alimentar a las gallinas. El grupo “Crecer” agradecen a los inversionistas Kiva por darles la oportunidad de crecer en sus negocios. Doris se encuentra sentada es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo guinda.
texts.en:
Doris, age 33, is married with 2 dependent children. She is part of the group, “Crecer” [to grow], which is composed of 5 enterprising women members. Doris raises laying hens, and as a secondary occupation, she distributes beauty products. 

She has planned to improve her farm, which is on her own premises.  She requested the loan for the purchase of cages, screens, and feed trays. The Crecer Group thanks the Kiva lenders for giving them the opportunity to grow in their businesses. 

Doris is seated second from the left, wearing a maroon polo.

loans.use: to purchase cages, screens, and feed trays.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Ana es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en  una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a sus  hijos. Su negocio es la   compra  y venta  de ganado desde hace 15 años.
Doña Ana vende desde su casa de habitación, necesita el préstamo para la compra reses, espera que el préstamo le ayude mucho ya que no cuenta con el capital necesarios para seguir  trabajando es su negocio, también espera un aumento en las ventas y con esto ganar más ingresos que beneficien el estilo de vida de la familia en el hogar. 
Uno de sus sueños es seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios para que tengan mayores oportunidades en la vida.



Choluteca, Honduras – Agosto del 2014
texts.en:
Ana is a very hard-working and responsible person.  She lives with her children in a community in southern Honduras.  Her business for the past 15 years has been buying and selling cattle.  Ana sells from the house where she lives.  She needs the loan to buy cattle.  Ana hopes the loan will help her a lot since she doesn't have the needed capital to keep working in this, her own business.  She also hopes for an increase in sales and with that to earn more income that will better her family's way of living at home. 

One of Ana's dreams is to keep supporting her children in their education so that they will have better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy cows for her business

loans.name: Boanerges Antonio

texts.es:
Boanerge de 31 años se dedica a la agricultura, creció con sus padres quienes le enseñaron esta actividad, su familia esta con formada  por su esposa quien le apoya con los oficios domésticos y el cuido de sus 2 hijos y en el ordeño de las vacas.

Boanerge se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. para ir a trabajar durante la mañana en sus cultivos en un terreno que alquila y durante el resto del día trabaja en otros terrenos o cuidando sus animales y su esposa vende la leche entre los vecinos para obtener un ingreso adicional. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar semilla, veneno, abono, rastreo de la tierra, etc. Para sembrar maíz que espera le produzca una buena cosecha para el sustento de su familia.

Boanerge planea en un futuro incursionar en sembrar jícama y con ayuda de otro crédito espera lograrlo, con el involucramiento de su esposa podrá obtener un mejor ingreso para su sustento.
texts.en:
Boanerge is 31 years old and works in farming. His parents taught him this job as he grew up, his family consists of his wife who helps him doing the domestic chores and looking after their 2 children, and he milks the cows.

Boanerge gets up at 4:30am to go to work, in the morning on his crop and a field that he rents, and during the rest of the day he works on other fields or caring for his animals, and his wife sells the milk to other neighbors to gain additional income.

The loan that he is requesting from CREDICAMPO, is to buy seeds, pesticide, fertilizer, plow the land, etc. to sow corn which he hopes will produce a good harvest to sustain his family.

Boanerge plans a future venture planting jicama and with the help of the other loan he hopes to achieve this, with the help of his wife he will be able to get a better income for their nourishment.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides, fertilizer, plow the land, etc. to plant corn and produce a good harvest.

loans.name: Rose

texts.fr: Agée de 31 ans Rose est mariée et  a six(6)  enfants en charge à Adidogomé. Elle fait  le commerce en vendant  des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle  s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et elle revend dans une boutique de son domicile. Rose sollicite ce microcrédit pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
31-year-old Rose is married with six children to care for in Adidogomé. She runs a business selling general food products. She resupplies four times a month at the main market in Lomé and resells at her home-based shop.

Rose is requesting this micro-credit loan to expand her stock supply so she can make more profit.

loans.use: buy one bag of rice and one bag of sugar

loans.name: Edica

texts.en:
Edica is 48 years old and she is from Siquijor.  She busies herself with hog raising activities.  The business primarily supports the needs of her family. 

Edica has applied for a loan from Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative to purchase additional bags of feed.  She hopes to become meat supplier to meat shops in their town.

loans.use: to purchase additional bags of feed

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 56 years old and lives in Guintomoyan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children, who are now adult-age.  For her means of living, Lourdes is engaged in hog fattening and a coconut buying and selling business, which she has done for three years.  Lourdes earns approximately PHP 7,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

Lourdes has requested a loan to purchase three sacks of booster feed and to fund the rolling capital of her coconut buying and selling business.  Lourdes has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Lourdes hopes to expand her hog fattening business.

loans.use: to purchase three sacks of booster feed, and to fund the rolling capital of her coconut buying and selling business

loans.name: Junna

texts.en:
Junna is 46 years old and lives in Naga, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.  She is married with four dependants, all school-aged.
 
For her source of living, Junna is engaged in managing a sari-sari store that sells groceries and other consumable products.  She has done this for four years and earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month from the business.

Junna has requested a loan to purchase additional stock of groceries and other consumable goods for retail. Junna has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Junna hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock of groceries and other consumable goods for retail.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.en:
Ermelinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines.  Ermelinda has been in this business for ten years now.

Ermelinda requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bicycle for her business.  

Ermelinda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bicycle for her business

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Evelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a welding shop.  Evelyn is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy gasoline and spare parts for her motorcycle transport business.

Evelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and spare parts for her motorcycle

loans.name: Djodji

texts.fr: Agée de 27 ans Djodji  est mariée et mère d’un  enfant résidant à Adidogomé. Elle a commencé son petit commerce depuis 3ans en  vendant des pommades et des produits cosmétiques. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend de façon ambulante. Djodji  dispose de stock de produits cosmétiques  et aimerait simplement augmenter son stock  afin de satisfaire ses clients. A cet effet, elle sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
27-year-old Djodji is married with one child and lives in Adidogomé. She started her business three years ago selling pomades and cosmetics. She resupplies two times a month at the main market in Lomé and resells as an itinerant vendor.

Djodji has a stock of cosmetics and simply would like to increase her stock to satisfy her customers. To this end, she is requesting this loan to expand her business and make more profit.

loans.use: buy 8 cartons of perfume, 5 cartons of hair straightener and 4 cartons of pomade

loans.name: Henri Jose

texts.es:
Con su coraje, humildad y calidad humana, Henri ha intentado forjarse un buen futuro al lado de sus tres hijos y su esposa a través del trabajo duro y la esperanza de que algún día pueda tener una vida plena y sin dificultades.

Trabaja como jornalero en diferentes fincas del municipio Planeta Rica, Córdoba realizando trabajos de agricultura y de producción de animales.

Hoy en día tiene un nuevo pensamiento y un deseo de ser independiente, es por eso que solicita ayuda económica para comprar un lote de pollos y de gallinas ponedoras para iniciar con un negocio de crianza y venta de pollos y huevos, adicionalmente necesita construir el galpón donde albergara a dichos animales.

Este préstamo le permitirá a Henri tener la posibilidad de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de trabajo, mejorando sus ingresos y teniendo la oportunidad de darles a sus hijos una mejor educación.

Ayuda a Henri a salir adelante con este negocio prestándole a su crédito!
texts.en: With his courage, humility and humanity, Henri has tried to forge a good future together with his three children and his wife through hard work and the hope that one day he can have a full life without difficulties. He works as a laborer in different farms in the municipality of Planeta Rica, Córdoba doing work in agriculture and animal production. These days he has a new idea and a desire to be independent. He is requesting economic assistance in order to buy a set of chickens and laying hens in order to start a business of raising and selling chickens. Additionally, he will need to construct a shed to accommodate these animals. This loan will allow Henri the opportunity to improve his living and working conditions, improve his income and give his children a better education. Help Henri move forward with this business by supporting his loan.

loans.use: buy chickens and hens and construct a shed to start a business of raising chickens and to fulfill his dream of being independent.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Yawa est âgée de 31 ans, mariée et mère de quatre(4)  enfants, elle  réside  à Adidogomé. Elle est revendeuse de maïs et d’igname. Elle  s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois au marché d’Agbélouvé et elle revend à la devanture de son domicile. Yawa sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Yawa is 31 years old, married with four children and lives in Adidogomé. She sells maize and yams. She resupplies four times a month at the Agbelouvé market and resells in front of her home. Yawa is requesting this loan to expand her stock and make more profit.

loans.use: Buy two calabashes of yams and 25 bowls of maize

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Agée de 34 ans Ayélé est divorcée et mère de deux(2)  enfants  résidant à Adidogomé. Elle fait le commerce de friperie. Elle  s'approvisionne 1 fois par mois au marché d’Hédzranawé et par la vente ambulante, elle revend dans les environs de son quartier. Ayélé sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: 34-year-old Ayélé is a divorced mother with two children living in Adidogomé. She has business trading used clothing. She resupplies once a month at the Hédzranawé market and resells around her neighborhood as an itinerant vendor. Ayélé is requesting this loan to expand her stock and make more profit.

loans.use: Buy 280 bodices and 100 skirts

loans.name: Yosymar Edu

texts.es:
Yosymar es un joven soltero, de 20 años de edad, vive en Santiago junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional debido a algunas situaciones económicas por las que afronta su familia, pero como es un hijo y hermano ejemplar por iniciativa propia empezó a trabajar en los Fundos Agrícolas como Obrero, para poder lleva un sustento a su hogar. Es muy responsable, trabajador, honesto y con muchos deseos de superación.
Yosymar quiere mejorar la calidad de vida a su familia, es por ello que está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar una cocina para su casa, de esta manera reemplazarán la cocina que tienen y ya está un poco malograda. De esta manera brindará mayor seguridad a su mamá al momento de preparar las comidas y seguirá luchando para más adelante poder estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Yosymar is a single 20 year old man. He lives in Santiago with his family. He is a person with a lot of desire to get ahead. He was not able to study to get a professional career because of the economic situation that his family faces; however, as a son and a brother, he has shown a lot of initiative and began to work at "los Fundos Agricolas como Obrero" (working as a laborer) in order to bring sustenance to his household.

He is very responsible, hardworking, honest, and has a lot of desire to excel. Yosymar wants to better the quality of life of his family, which is why he is really grateful to the lenders at Kiva. With their support, he will be able to buy a new kitchen for his house; it will replace the current kitchen that is in bad condition. That way, he will be able to bring better security to his mother as she prepares food. He will continue fighting to get ahead and be able to study for a professional career.

loans.use: to buy a kitchen for his home.

loans.name: Vasquez Yupanqui

texts.es: Andrés un joven de 18 años que estudia la carrera de mecánica de mantenimiento. Decidió estudiar dicha carrera  al ver que era su vocación, pues desde muy joven siempre le interesó conocer referente a maquinarias. Actualmente recibe el apoyo de sus padres para cubrir con el pago de su mensualidad. En esta ocasión requiere una computadora para realizar sus trabajos de estudio. Es por ello que solicitó el  crédito para la compra de una laptop lo cual le será de mucha utilidad. El deseo de Andrés es de terminar satisfactoriamente su carrera y así poder incorporarse al mercado laboral. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por facilitar dicho crédito ya que le permite su progreso.
texts.en:
Andres is an 18 year old boy who is currently studying for a career in mechanical maintenance. He decided to study this course to be his vocation because he has always been interested in machinery since he was young. 

He has received support from his parents to assist him with his monthly university payments. However, he now needs a computer to help him complete the work he has for school. This is why he is asking for a loan; in order to buy a laptop, which will be really useful. Andres desires to complete his studies well, and to enter the labor market. He is grateful to the lenders at Kiva for providing him with this loan and allowing him to continue progressing.

loans.use: to buy a laptop, which will be really useful for his studies.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de trois enfants à 25 ans, Yawa  réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend des poissons frits. Elle achète les poissons congelés qu’elle fait frire et s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois dans un frigo à Totsi. Elle  revend de façon ambulante à la devanture de son domicile. Yawa sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Married with three children at age 25, Yawa resides in Adidogomé. She sells fried fish. She buys frozen fish and then fries them. She resupplies four times a month from a freezer in Totsi. She resells as an itinerant vendor in front of her home. Yawa is requesting this loan to expand her business and make more profit.

loans.use: buy two cartons of fish

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad es una mujer de 31 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene dos hijos y se dedica  a la venta de comida.
Ella es muy emprendedora, responsable, comunicadora, amable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en el barrio ‘Plan 3000’ que se encuentra en la ciudad de Santa Cruz este. En este barrio se dan cita personas que emigraron de todas partes del país para trabajar, productores de todas las áreas se juntan y comercian sus productos en calles de tierra y arena.
Soledad es de tez morena, cabello largo castaño, estatura mediana, su lengua nativa es el español. Sus dos hijos son el motor que impulsa a Soledad a buscar nuevas metas para mejorar su calidad de vida, antes se ocupaba de la venta de ropa y desde hace siete meses que Su negocio es la venta de comida y lo realiza de lunes a domingo para la hora del almuerzo. Ella desea ampliar su negocio realizando la compra de muebles de restaurante (mesas y sillas) y utensilios de cocina como ollas, sartenes, cubiertos, vasos, etc.

Es por esos motivos que Soledad solicita un préstamo para ampliar su restaurante y con los beneficios educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Soledad is 31 years old and lives with her partner. She has two children and owns a restaurant.

Soledad is very enterprising, responsible, communicative, friendly and hard-working. She runs her business in the Plan 3000 barrio in the east of the city of Santa Cruz. This barrio is for people who have immigrated from other parts of the country in order to work. The residents here are business-people who have come together to sell their goods on streets made of earth and sand.

Soledad is dark-skinned, has long, dark hair, is of medium height, and has Spanish as her native tongue. Her two children give her the drive to look for new goals in order to improve her quality of life. Previously, Soledad made a living selling clothes but, for seven months, she has had a restaurant. Soledad works seven days a week selling lunches. Soledad wants to expand her business and buy furniture (chairs and table) for the restaurant, as well as kitchen utensils such as a pots, frying pans, cutlery, glasses and more.

Soledad is applying for a loan to buy these items; she will use it to expand her restaurant and use the profits to educate her children.

loans.use: to expand her restaurant and use the profits to educate her children.

loans.name: Ma. Gene

texts.en:
Ma. Gene is 32 years old, married and has four children, two of whom are currently in school.

She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has been farming vegetables for 4 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Agée de 29 ans Adjovi est mariée et mère de deux(2) enfants résidant à Adidogomé. Elle est couturière  de formation mais a commencé son petit commerce en  vendant des condiments et des petits poissons. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend sous un hangar à domicile. Adjovi sollicite ce prêt  pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
29-year-old Adjovi is married with two children and lives in Adidogomé. She is a trained seamstress but began a business selling condiments and small fish. She resupplies twice a month at the main market in Lomé and resells under a shed at her home.

Adjovi is requesting this loan to expand her business and make more profit.

loans.use: buy ten packages of bouillon cubes, five baskets of onions, and five basins of fried fish

loans.name: Améyo

texts.fr: Agée de 33 ans, Améyo  est mariée et mère de deux  enfants résidant à Adidogomé. Elle fait le commerce des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois au marché de Totsi et revend de façon ambulante. Améyo sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
33-year-old Ameyo is married with two children and lives in Adidogomé. She sells general food products. She resupplies four times a month at the market in Totso and resells as an itinerant vendor.

Ameyo is requesting this loan to expand her business and make more profit.

loans.use: buy 2.5 cartons of spaghetti, 2 cartons of tomatoes and 2 bags of detergent

loans.name: Alvegia

texts.en:
Alvegia is 20 years old, and is the fourth daughter of Rosita. They live in Alcala. 

Alvegia is a student starting Elementary Education. She wants to become a teacher someday and to help improve her family's living conditions. Sometimes they are short of money and that is why she has not been able to pay her tuition fees on time. Therefore she is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to pay tuition fees and to buy books to use at school. 

This loan will help her to achieve her dreams and become successful in her career.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees and buy books to use at school

loans.name: Lisilda

texts.en:
Lisilda is a 38-year-old married woman with five children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Lisilda has a ready-to-wear clothes business in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothes to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for 4 years. 

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothes to sell to her customers

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive never gets tired in her fish-selling activity. She earns a meager income of PHP 3,000 per month that helps her to support her family. 

She sells fish in the neighborhood and hopes one day to own a stall to display her fish better. 

Olive has recently taken out a loan to buy more kilos of fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of fish to sell

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a handicraft business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks like shells, nylon threads, wire, etc. for her handicraft business. She has been in this business for 10 years, and also earns more income from a general store.

Lucy has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks like shells, nylon threads, wire, etc. for her business

loans.name: Zinamyadar

texts.en:
Zinamyadar is 52 years old and lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a driver at a private firm since 2008. His wife teaches at a kindergarten. 

Using his previous loan, he managed to renovate his house which has vulnerable walls and windows.

Now he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and planks in order to build a house for his newly married son. Currently his son is living with his family in a traditional Mongolian ger (a portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. After building the house and when his son's family can move into it, they will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned for heating and then less pollutants will be released into the air. Living in a high quality house is more ecological than living in a traditional Mongolian ger.

loans.use: to build a house for his son where they will burn less coal for heating

loans.name: Gabriela De Jesus

texts.es:
Gabriela es una mujer de campo con empuje y perseverancia, vive con sus dos hijos en una humilde finca en zona rural de Fredonia, Antioquia. 

Vive con su familia en una humilde finca a las afueras del municipio desde donde realiza varias actividades para subsistir.

Se gana la vida con la cría y producción de cerdos de engorde y con la fabricación de artesanías como manillas y collares; esta actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años con el fin de obtener los recursos suficientes para la manutención de su familia. 

Ella trabaja todos los días ya que sus cerdos requieren de aseo, alimentación y monitoreo constante para su correcto desarrollo y posterior venta, además sus artesanías las vende en el municipio los fines de semana.

Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar concentrado y alimento para sus animales, compra de cerdos y compra de materiales para fabricación de sus artesanías, dándole la oportunidad de tener unos mejores ingresos y mejor producción.

Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos como profesionales y con la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a woman from the country with drive and perseverance, she lives with her two children on a humble farm in a rural zone of Fredonia, Antioquia.

She lives with her family on a modest farm on the outskirts of the town where she does various jobs to survive.

She makes a living raising and selling fattened pigs and making handicrafts such as bracelets and necklaces; she has been doing this work for 10 years with the aim of earning enough to to support her family.

She works every day as her pigs need grooming, feeding and constant monitoring so they develop properly and can then be sold, also she sells her handicrafts in the town on weekends.

She is requesting a loan to buy concentrated feed and feed for her animals to buy pigs and materials to make her handicrafts, giving her the opportunity to have better earnings and better production.

She dreams of seeing her children become professional people with the best education possible.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed and concentrated feed and buy raw materials to make crafts.

loans.name: Santos Del Rosario

texts.es: Santos tiene 33 años de edad y habita junto a su hija de 12 años de edad. Santos es una mujer luchadora que con mucho esfuerzo se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de mariscos, verduras y frutas desde hace mucho tiempo. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante y en su hogar de habitación.  Gracias al apoyo que ha recibido de instituciones como FUSAI ha podido mantener su negocio que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Nuevamente solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mariscos, verduras y frutas al por mayor para poder cubrir una mayor cuota de mercado y poder así seguir llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Santos is 33 years old and lives with her 12 years old daughter. Santos is a fighter who with much effort makes a living and sustains her household. She has worked buying and selling seafood, vegetables and fruit for a long time. She does her sales on foot and from her home. Thanks to the support she has received from institutions such as FUSAI she has been able her keep her business going, as it is her main sources of income. 

She is asking for a loan again from FUSAI to invest in buying seafood, vegetables and fruit wholesale to be able to cover a greater market share so she can continue feeding her family.

loans.use: to buy: seafood, vegetables and fruit for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine to improve her production and be able to support her household.

loans.name: Kanfitine

texts.fr: Agée de 31 ans kanfitine est mariée et mère de deux(2)  enfants  résidant à Adidogomé. Elle fait du commerce d’alimentation générale. Elle  s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois au marché de Totsi et elle revend au marché d’asiyéyé. Kanfitine sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
At 31 years old, Kanfitine lives in Adidogomé, is married, and is a mother of two children. She works selling general foodstuffs.

She procures her goods two times a month in the Totsi market and then resells them at the Asiyéyé market.

Kanfitine is seeking a loan in order to increase her stock and earn more profits.

loans.use: to buy one sac of corn and one sac of rice

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Agée de 41 ans Yawa est mariée sans enfant résidant à Adidogomé. Elle fait le petit commerce en vendant des boissons alcoolisées. Elle  s'approvisionne 8 fois par mois au marché d’Adidogomé et elle revend à  son domicile et au marché. Yawa sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son stock afin de faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
At 41 years old, Yawa lives in Adidogomé and is married with no children. She works selling alcoholic beverages.

She procures her goods eight times a month from the Adidogomé market and then resells them from her home and at a market.

Yawa is seeking a loan to increase her stock and earn more profits.

loans.use: to buy 20 cases of drinks

loans.name: Amka Group

texts.fr: Balingene est femme ambitieuse, membre du collectif de crédits Amka, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 35ans, mère de 8 enfants dont 3 vont à l’école et 5 encore gosses. Elle commença son businesse avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse de friperie sur la route secondaire de la ville. Elle va s’approvisionner en habits dames, etc. Son conjoint est un agent de sécurité. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.Il sied signaler que quelques clientes portent leur bébés
texts.en:
Balingene is an ambitious women, who is a member of the business group Amka and a client of the micro-finance institution Hekima. She is married, 35 years old, and a mother of eight children. Three of her children go to school, while the other five are already grown. Her husband is a security guard.

Balingene sells used clothing along one of the streets in town. She started this business from funds that she received from her husband. 

[With this loan] she is going to buy women's clothing, among other things.

She wishes to obtain more loans so that she can increase her business, and feed and school her children.

Finally, Balingene thanks Hekima for their support of entrepreneurs who lack access to banking services. 

It should be noted, that some of the members are holding their children.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing

loans.name: Tatiana Raquel

texts.es:
Tatiana de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta 9º grado, debido a la situación económica dejo de estudiar, esta casada y su esposo trabaja de albañil, tienen 3 hijos, 2 están estudiando, y nadie mas vive con ellos.

Tatiana comenta que ella ha trabajado de varios oficios, trabajo como domestica varios años, también vendiendo tostadas, enchiladas, tamales y mas.- pero hace unos 6 meses tiene una pequeña granja de pollos y dice que la necesidad y el deseo de sacar a su familia adelante la ha llevado a hacer de todo un poco.- Su día de trabajo comienza a las 5:00 am, pues se levanta temprano para ponerle desayuno a su esposo y despachar a los hijos que estudian, y luego atiende su pequeña granja.- Ella dice que no tiene horario, pero por su  familia lo hace con mucho gusto.


El crédito  es para comprar  6 laminas, 3 cuartones, 18 yardas de cedazo, una bolsa de cemento, 100 pollos y 6 quintales de concentrado.

Los sueños de Tatiana son comprar un terreno y construir su propia casa, ya que hoy vive en terreno de la suegra, que sus hijos se preparen en una carrera universitaria y con la ganancia pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Tatiana is 33 years old, she studied up to 9th grade, due to her economic situation she left school, she is married and her husband works as a bricklayer, they have 3 children, 2 go to school, nobody else lives with them.

Tatiana says the she has worked in various jobs, she worked as a domestic maid, she also sold tostadas, enchiladas, tamales, etc., but 6 months ago she got a small farm and she says that need and the desire to get her family ahead drove her to try all sorts of jobs. Her working day starts at 5am, she gets up to make breakfast and get her children off to school. Then she tends to her small farm. She days she doesn't have a timetable, but for her family's sake she does it with pleasure.

The loan is to buy 6 sheets of steel, 3 wood beams, 18 yards of lattice, a bag of cement, 100 chickens and 6 bushels of feed concentrate.

Tatiana's dreams are: to buy a plot of land and build her own home, as she now lives on the land of her mother-in-law; that her children will go to university and with the profit she makes, replay the loan.

loans.use: to buy 6 sheets of steel, 3 wood beams, 18 yards of lattice, a bag of cement, 100 chickens and 6 bushels of feed concentrate.
